7380897604713*DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Black) PS2 - System Deck OnlyItem Description Shipping Info Payment Info *DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Black) PS2 - System Deck Only Defective - For Parts or Repair Only! *DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Black) PS2 - System Deck Only This auction is for a defective black Playstation 2 slim console. Defects are sold in non-working condition and should be bought for parts or repair only. They may be missing parts or pieces. They will come with no power cords, controllers, accessories, or peripherals ("deck only"). Please be advised these photos are our own stock images to provide you with a good idea of what the consoles will look like. The exact consoles you receive may or may not feature the same cosmetic defects shown here, such as cracks in the casings, discoloration, missing parts or pieces, missing faceplates, stickers, and so forth. Product Condition in Detail: * Defective - These products are used and sold in defective condition. These products are NOT in working condition and should be purchased with the intention for using them as parts or for repair. Defective items may be missing part and/or pieces. Systems will not include hard drives. Systems may or may not feature cosmetic damage. Game products will include the game disc(s). Games may or may not include a DVD or game case (will be shipped in a disc sleeve as alternative). Accessory products will include the accessory advertised and may or may not include product instruction manual. Game disc(s) may or may not feature slight scuffs and scratches per use. Game cases and accessories may be slightly dirty and/or feature pen marks and stickers (note, see refunds and return policy for Gamers Inc. product bar code information). This action is for a defective copy of the product only and will not include any additional accessories and it may or may not include additional content codes such as on line pass codes or additional down loadable content. As this item is defective, any content codes that may be included are not guaranteed to work (may be expired or previously used by original owner). Note: We cannot pull games by request for specific feature such as instruction manuals or working content codes. Depending on the game, some exceptions may be made, at our discretion. All photos are stock images unless otherwise specified. All games come with original cover art unless otherwise specified. Used games may, or may not, be Greatest Hits/Selects/Platinum Hits version. Additional Information about Sony PlayStation 2 Slim Charcoal Black Console (NTSC - SCPH-70012) Product Description Weighing just 900g, the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim is a lightweight entertainment hub that you can carry with you everywhere you go. With an enormous game library of over 1400 games, this Sony console gives you a wide variety to choose from. The integrated Ethernet and modem ports of this gaming console give you the liberty of online gaming anytime, anywhere. Add to your excitement with the high-resolution 3D graphics you get with the gravity, environmental elements and friction simulations introduced by the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim. The Dolby Digital AC-3 and DTS sound of this Sony console add to the realism. Whether it is killing your online foe or making your buddy eat dirt in a sports game, the Dualshock analog controller of this gaming console, with 255 sensitivity levels, makes it happen. Product Identifiers Brand Sony Product Name Sony PlayStation 2 Slim MPN SCPH-70012 Product Line Sony PlayStation General Type Console Color Charcoal Black Release Date 11/1/2004 Audio Audio Output Support Stereo Power & Battery Power Source Types Power Supply - internal Depth 6 in. Dimensions Height 1 in. Weight 2 lb Width 9 in. Display CPU MIPS R5900 Technical Details Ram Technology RDRAM (RAMBUS) Supported Media CD-ROM, DVD-ROM Ram Capacity 32 MB Region Code NTSC Graphic Memory Capacity 4 MB Features Country Region United States Manufacturer: *DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Black) PS2 - System Deck Only Model: Buyer/Bidder Please Note By bidding on our items, you are agreeing to pay for the item should you be the winning bidder (unfortunately, we do not accept NON-US PayPal payments, please DO NOT bid if your PayPal is NON-US). If you have an issue with a product, please message us through eBay messages before leaving feedback or opening a case. We will do our best to make things right. Products feature Gamers, Inc. retail labels and barcode. Please do not remove these stickers until you are 100% statisfied with the product. We do not accept retruns on products that are missing our labels. We currently ship only to the contiguous United States. We do not ship internationally, or to APOs, FPOs, U.S. territories, Alaska, or Hawaii at this time. Please do not bid if you are not located in the contiguous United States. To ensure that your item(s) are packaged correctly, please allow 1-3 business days for us to process your order. Before submitting payment, make sure that your shipping address is 100% accurate on eBay, as they are who provide us with the shipping address. We ship fast, and may not be able to change/update the address once the order process has begun. If the package is shipped incorrectly we will request payment for additional shipping attempts. We are not responsible for any delays due to an incorrect address. Wholesale lots and orders over one pound must have a physical address to ship to. We will contact buyers regarding a change or update of address as soon as we are made aware of the issue. If we do not receive an updated address from the buyer within a week of the date we sent a message, we will be forced to refund you minus a restocking fee of 15%. We offer shipping only and will not accommodate any kind of local pickup. Returns and Refunds We offer a 14-day, money back warranty on our products. To qualify for a return the product must be defective upon arrival and first play or have been damaged during shipping. Products must be returned in the exact condition in which it was sent/received. Brand new items must have the original box packaging, instructions, paperwork, ect. Our warranty do not cover customer abuse or neglect. This warranty does not cover the following products: Cheating devices (GameShark, Action Replay, ect.) Strategy Guides Wall Scrolls Apparel PC Games Wholesale lots Defective items (Unverified ESN iPhones, products listed as defective). For returns that are not defective, we will charge a 15% restocking fee which will be taken from the refund of the purchase amount. If you receive an item that is defective or was damaged during shipping, please let us know right away, before leaving feedback, and we will make it right! Please do not bid on our autions if your PayPal account is not a U.S. account. We will be forced to cancel your bids/orders. We ask that payment is submitted within seven (7) days of the auctions ends date. Please make sure you address is 100% accurate through your eBay account (that is the source that provides us your shipping address) before submitting payment. Please see Shipping Info for more information. We currently only accept payments to be made by PayPal. About Gamers, INC. Gamers, Inc. operates various video game retail locations in the Midwest. Specialising in used games and accessories for over 17 years, Gamers has allowed any customer to get in the game at an affordable cost. We have everything from Atari 2600 to Xbox 360, Game Gear to Nintendo 3DS and everything in between. Feel free to check out our other listings! We've got just about everything you want for your business, or personal collection to grow! Find more deals in our eBay store! FAQ Who will my item ship with? World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2132.5

Defects are sold in non-working condition and should be bought for parts or repair only. They may be missing parts or pieces. They will come with no power cords, controllers, accessories, or peripherals ("deck only"). Please be advised these photos are our own stock images to provide you with a good idea of what the consoles will look like. The exact consoles you receive may or may not feature the same cosmetic defects shown here, such as cracks in the casings, discoloration, missing parts or pieces, missing faceplates, stickers, and so forth. Product Condition in Detail: * Defective - These products are used and sold in defective condition. These products are NOT in working condition and should be purchased with the intention for using them as parts or for repair. Defective items may be missing part and/or pieces. Systems will not include hard drives. Systems may or may not feature cosmetic damage. Game products will include the game disc(s). Games may or may not include a DVD or game case (will be shipped in a disc sleeve as alternative). Accessory products will include the accessory advertised and may or may not include product instruction manual. Game disc(s) may or may not feature slight scuffs and scratches per use. Game cases and accessories may be slightly dirty and/or feature pen marks and stickers (note, see refunds and return policy for Gamers Inc. product bar code information). This action is for a defective copy of the product only and will not include any additional accessories and it may or may not include additional content codes such as on line pass codes or additional down loadable content. As this item is defective, any content codes that may be included are not guaranteed to work (may be expired or previously used by original owner). Note: We cannot pull games by request for specific feature such as instruction manuals or working content codes. Depending on the game, some exceptions may be made, at our discretion. All photos are stock images unless otherwise specified. All games come with original cover art unless otherwise specified. Used games may, or may not, be Greatest Hits/Selects/Platinum Hits version. Additional Information about Sony PlayStation 2 Slim Charcoal Black Console (NTSC - SCPH-70012) Product Description Weighing just 900g, the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim is a lightweight entertainment hub that you can carry with you everywhere you go. With an enormous game library of over 1400 games, this Sony console gives you a wide variety to choose from. The integrated Ethernet and modem ports of this gaming console give you the liberty of online gaming anytime, anywhere. Add to your excitement with the high-resolution 3D graphics you get with the gravity, environmental elements and friction simulations introduced by the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim. The Dolby Digital AC-3 and DTS sound of this Sony console add to the realism. Whether it is killing your online foe or making your buddy eat dirt in a sports game, the Dualshock analog controller of this gaming console, with 255 sensitivity levels, makes it happen. We ship fast, and may not be able to change/update the address once the order process has begun. If the package is shipped incorrectly we will request payment for additional shipping attempts. We are not responsible for any delays due to an incorrect address. Wholesale lots and orders over one pound must have a physical address to ship to. We will contact buyers regarding a change or update of address as soon as we are made aware of the issue. If we do not receive an updated address from the buyer within a week of the date we sent a message, we will be forced to refund you minus a restocking fee of 15%. We offer shipping only and will not accommodate any kind of local pickup. Returns and Refunds We offer a 14-day, money back warranty on our products. To qualify for a return the product must be defective upon arrival and first play or have been damaged during shipping. Products must be returned in the exact condition in which it was sent/received. Brand new items must have the original box packaging, instructions, paperwork, ect. Our warranty do not cover customer abuse or neglect. This warranty does not cover the following products: Cheating devices (GameShark, Action Replay, ect.) Strategy Guides Wall Scrolls Apparel PC Games Wholesale lots Defective items (Unverified ESN iPhones, products listed as defective). For returns that are not defective, we will charge a 15% restocking fee which will be taken from the refund of the purchase amount. The exact consoles you receive may or may not feature the same cosmetic defects shown here, such as cracks in the casings, discoloration, missing parts or pieces, missing faceplates, stickers, and so forth. Product Condition in Detail: * Defective - These products are used and sold in defective condition. These products are NOT in working condition and should be purchased with the intention for using them as parts or for repair. Defective items may be missing part and/or pieces. Systems will not include hard drives. Systems may or may not feature cosmetic damage. Game products will include the game disc(s). Games may or may not include a DVD or game case (will be shipped in a disc sleeve as alternative). Accessory products will include the accessory advertised and may or may not include product instruction manual. Game disc(s) may or may not feature slight scuffs and scratches per use. Game cases and accessories may be slightly dirty and/or feature pen marks and stickers (note, see refunds and return policy for Gamers Inc. product bar code information). This action is for a defective copy of the product only and will not include any additional accessories and it may or may not include additional content codes such as on line pass codes or additional down loadable content. As this item is defective, any content codes that may be included are not guaranteed to work (may be expired or previously used by original owner). Note: We cannot pull games by request for specific feature such as instruction manuals or working content codes. Depending on the game, some exceptions may be made, at our discretion. All photos are stock images unless otherwise specified. All games come with original cover art unless otherwise specified. Used games may, or may not, be Greatest Hits/Selects/Platinum Hits version. Additional Information about Sony PlayStation 2 Slim Charcoal Black Console (NTSC - SCPH-70012) Product Description Weighing just 900g, the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim is a lightweight entertainment hub that you can carry with you everywhere you go. With an enormous game library of over 1400 games, this Sony console gives you a wide variety to choose from. The integrated Ethernet and modem ports of this gaming console give you the liberty of online gaming anytime, anywhere. Add to your excitement with the high-resolution 3D graphics you get with the gravity, environmental elements and friction simulations introduced by the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim. The Dolby Digital AC-3 and DTS sound of this Sony console add to the realism. Whether it is killing your online foe or making your buddy eat dirt in a sports game, the Dualshock analog controller of this gaming console, with 255 sensitivity levels, makes it happen. To qualify for a return the product must be defective upon arrival and first play or have been damaged during shipping. Products must be returned in the exact condition in which it was sent/received. Brand new items must have the original box packaging, instructions, paperwork, ect. Our warranty do not cover customer abuse or neglect. This warranty does not cover the following products: Cheating devices (GameShark, Action Replay, ect.) Strategy Guides Wall Scrolls Apparel PC Games Wholesale lots Defective items (Unverified ESN iPhones, products listed as defective). For returns that are not defective, we will charge a 15% restocking fee which will be taken from the refund of the purchase amount. If you receive an item that is defective or was damaged during shipping, please let us know right away, before leaving feedback, and we will make it right! If you have an issue with a product, please message us through eBay messages before leaving feedback or opening a case. We will do our best to make things right. Products feature Gamers, Inc. retail labels and barcode. Please do not remove these stickers until you are 100% statisfied with the product. We do not accept retruns on products that are missing our labels. We currently ship only to the contiguous United States. We do not ship internationally, or to APOs, FPOs, U.S. territories, Alaska, or Hawaii at this time. Please do not bid if you are not located in the contiguous United States. To ensure that your item(s) are packaged correctly, please allow 1-3 business days for us to process your order. Before submitting payment, make sure that your shipping address is 100% accurate on eBay, as they are who provide us with the shipping address. We ship fast, and may not be able to change/update the address once the order process has begun. If the package is shipped incorrectly we will request payment for additional shipping attempts. We are not responsible for any delays due to an incorrect address. Wholesale lots and orders over one pound must have a physical address to ship to. We will contact buyers regarding a change or update of address as soon as we are made aware of the issue. If we do not receive an updated address from the buyer within a week of the date we sent a message, we will be forced to refund you minus a restocking fee of 15%. We offer shipping only and will not accommodate any kind of local pickup. Returns and Refunds We offer a 14-day, money back warranty on our products. To qualify for a return the product must be defective upon arrival and first play or have been damaged during shipping. Products must be returned in the exact condition in which it was sent/received. Brand new items must have the original box packaging, instructions, paperwork, ect. Our warranty do not cover customer abuse or neglect. This warranty does not cover the following products: Cheating devices (GameShark, Action Replay, ect.) Strategy Guides Wall Scrolls Apparel PC Games Wholesale lots Defective items (Unverified ESN iPhones, products listed as defective). For returns that are not defective, we will charge a 15% restocking fee which will be taken from the refund of the purchase amount. If you receive an item that is defective or was damaged during shipping, please let us know right away, before leaving feedback, and we will make it right! Please do not bid on our autions if your PayPal account is not a U.S. account. We will be forced to cancel your bids/orders. We ask that payment is submitted within seven (7) days of the auctions ends date. Please make sure you address is 100% accurate through your eBay account (that is the source that provides us your shipping address) before submitting payment. Please see Shipping Info for more information. We currently only accept payments to be made by PayPal. About Gamers, INC. Gamers, Inc. operates various video game retail locations in the Midwest. Specialising in used games and accessories for over 17 years, Gamers has allowed any customer to get in the game at an affordable cost. Find more deals in our eBay store! FAQ Who will my item ship with? World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2114.5

Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2114.5

The exact consoles you receive may or may not feature the same cosmetic defects shown here, such as cracks in the casings, discoloration, missing parts or pieces, missing faceplates, stickers, and so forth. Product Condition in Detail: * Defective - These products are used and sold in defective condition. These products are NOT in working condition and should be purchased with the intention for using them as parts or for repair. Defective items may be missing part and/or pieces. Systems will not include hard drives. Systems may or may not feature cosmetic damage. Game products will include the game disc(s). Games may or may not include a DVD or game case (will be shipped in a disc sleeve as alternative). Accessory products will include the accessory advertised and may or may not include product instruction manual. Game disc(s) may or may not feature slight scuffs and scratches per use. Game cases and accessories may be slightly dirty and/or feature pen marks and stickers (note, see refunds and return policy for Gamers Inc. product bar code information). This action is for a defective copy of the product only and will not include any additional accessories and it may or may not include additional content codes such as on line pass codes or additional down loadable content. As this item is defective, any content codes that may be included are not guaranteed to work (may be expired or previously used by original owner). Note: We cannot pull games by request for specific feature such as instruction manuals or working content codes. Depending on the game, some exceptions may be made, at our discretion. All photos are stock images unless otherwise specified. All games come with original cover art unless otherwise specified. Used games may, or may not, be Greatest Hits/Selects/Platinum Hits version. Additional Information about Sony PlayStation 2 Slim Charcoal Black Console (NTSC - SCPH-70012) Product Description Weighing just 900g, the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim is a lightweight entertainment hub that you can carry with you everywhere you go. With an enormous game library of over 1400 games, this Sony console gives you a wide variety to choose from. The integrated Ethernet and modem ports of this gaming console give you the liberty of online gaming anytime, anywhere. Add to your excitement with the high-resolution 3D graphics you get with the gravity, environmental elements and friction simulations introduced by the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim. The Dolby Digital AC-3 and DTS sound of this Sony console add to the realism. Whether it is killing your online foe or making your buddy eat dirt in a sports game, the Dualshock analog controller of this gaming console, with 255 sensitivity levels, makes it happen. If you have an issue with a product, please message us through eBay messages before leaving feedback or opening a case. We will do our best to make things right. Products feature Gamers, Inc. retail labels and barcode. Please do not remove these stickers until you are 100% statisfied with the product. We do not accept retruns on products that are missing our labels. We currently ship only to the contiguous United States. We do not ship internationally, or to APOs, FPOs, U.S. territories, Alaska, or Hawaii at this time. Please do not bid if you are not located in the contiguous United States. To ensure that your item(s) are packaged correctly, please allow 1-3 business days for us to process your order. Before submitting payment, make sure that your shipping address is 100% accurate on eBay, as they are who provide us with the shipping address. We ship fast, and may not be able to change/update the address once the order process has begun. If the package is shipped incorrectly we will request payment for additional shipping attempts. We are not responsible for any delays due to an incorrect address. Wholesale lots and orders over one pound must have a physical address to ship to. We will contact buyers regarding a change or update of address as soon as we are made aware of the issue. If we do not receive an updated address from the buyer within a week of the date we sent a message, we will be forced to refund you minus a restocking fee of 15%. We offer shipping only and will not accommodate any kind of local pickup. Returns and Refunds We offer a 14-day, money back warranty on our products. To qualify for a return the product must be defective upon arrival and first play or have been damaged during shipping. Products must be returned in the exact condition in which it was sent/received. Brand new items must have the original box packaging, instructions, paperwork, ect. Our warranty do not cover customer abuse or neglect. This warranty does not cover the following products: Cheating devices (GameShark, Action Replay, ect.) Strategy Guides Wall Scrolls Apparel PC Games Wholesale lots Defective items (Unverified ESN iPhones, products listed as defective). For returns that are not defective, we will charge a 15% restocking fee which will be taken from the refund of the purchase amount. If you receive an item that is defective or was damaged during shipping, please let us know right away, before leaving feedback, and we will make it right! Please do not bid on our autions if your PayPal account is not a U.S. account. We will be forced to cancel your bids/orders. We ask that payment is submitted within seven (7) days of the auctions ends date. Please make sure you address is 100% accurate through your eBay account (that is the source that provides us your shipping address) before submitting payment. Please see Shipping Info for more information. We currently only accept payments to be made by PayPal. About Gamers, INC. Gamers, Inc. operates various video game retail locations in the Midwest. If we do not receive an updated address from the buyer within a week of the date we sent a message, we will be forced to refund you minus a restocking fee of 15%. We offer shipping only and will not accommodate any kind of local pickup. Returns and Refunds We offer a 14-day, money back warranty on our products. To qualify for a return the product must be defective upon arrival and first play or have been damaged during shipping. Products must be returned in the exact condition in which it was sent/received. Brand new items must have the original box packaging, instructions, paperwork, ect. Our warranty do not cover customer abuse or neglect. This warranty does not cover the following products: Cheating devices (GameShark, Action Replay, ect.) Strategy Guides Wall Scrolls Apparel PC Games Wholesale lots Defective items (Unverified ESN iPhones, products listed as defective). For returns that are not defective, we will charge a 15% restocking fee which will be taken from the refund of the purchase amount. If you receive an item that is defective or was damaged during shipping, please let us know right away, before leaving feedback, and we will make it right! Please do not bid on our autions if your PayPal account is not a U.S. account. We will be forced to cancel your bids/orders. We ask that payment is submitted within seven (7) days of the auctions ends date. Please make sure you address is 100% accurate through your eBay account (that is the source that provides us your shipping address) before submitting payment. Please see Shipping Info for more information. We currently only accept payments to be made by PayPal. About Gamers, INC. Gamers, Inc. operates various video game retail locations in the Midwest. Specialising in used games and accessories for over 17 years, Gamers has allowed any customer to get in the game at an affordable cost. We have everything from Atari 2600 to Xbox 360, Game Gear to Nintendo 3DS and everything in between. Feel free to check out our other listings! We've got just about everything you want for your business, or personal collection to grow! Payment for won item is expected no later than 4 days after the auction closes unless prior arrangements are made. We do not mark merchandise values below actual value, or mark items as "gifts". The purchaser is responsible for all Customs, Brokerage and Duty fees!! This item will be shipped via USPS Priority or UPS ground for large items. Shipments will only be made to confirmed PayPal addresses. US Shipping Our goal is to ship within three (3) days of PayPal receipt of payment, and we guarantee it will leave our store within three (3) business days. Shipping time with UPS Priority is generally 2-6 business days and we will email the tracking information when shipment is made. Expedited shipping is available for additional costs at the buyer's expense, so please email any special requests, and we will try to get you a quote within 24 hours. We currently ship from multiple locations in the states of Texas, Tennessee, Illinois, Washington, Nevada, and Florida. International Shipping Our goal is to ship your item to ebay's Global Shipping warehouse within three (3) days of PayPal receipt of payment, and we guarantee it will leave our store within three (3) business days. Shipping time with USPS Priority is generally 2-6 business days to their warehouse and we will email the tracking information when shipment is made. We currently ship from multiple locations in the states of Texas, Tennessee, Illinois, Washington, Nevada, and Florida. PayPal also gives you the flexibility to pay with your checking account, debit or credit cards. Payment is expected within eight (8) days. Sales tax must be collected for all Texas, Tennessee, Illinois, Washington, Nevada, and Florida buyers. We are unable to accept orders from resellers. Payment is expected within eight (8) days of auction end. Be sure to monitor email (and "Junk E-Mail") upon completion of auction for Cash America results notification. No other warranties or guarantees are made on behalf of Cash America Internet Sales, Inc., and merchandise is sold "as is" and has no warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose. We are confident your item will perform as expected, but if you encounter any issues you can return it for a full refund within 30 days of the purchase date. ONE-YEAR SERVICE WARRANTY Cash America certifies that all of our pre-owned Rolex Watches have been completely serviced and are in good working condition. We warrant the proper operation of our watches from date of purchase for one (1) full year. This warranty does not cover problems arising from abuse, mistreatment, or tampering. 120141274523543*DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Black) PS2 - System Deck OnlyItem Description Shipping Info Payment Info *DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Black) PS2 - System Deck Only Defective - For Parts or Repair Only! *DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Black) PS2 - System Deck Only This auction is for a defective black Playstation 2 slim console. Defects are sold in non-working condition and should be bought for parts or repair only. They may be missing parts or pieces. They will come with no power cords, controllers, accessories, or peripherals ("deck only"). Please be advised these photos are our own stock images to provide you with a good idea of what the consoles will look like. The exact consoles you receive may or may not feature the same cosmetic defects shown here, such as cracks in the casings, discoloration, missing parts or pieces, missing faceplates, stickers, and so forth. Product Condition in Detail: * Defective - These products are used and sold in defective condition. These products are NOT in working condition and should be purchased with the intention for using them as parts or for repair. Defective items may be missing part and/or pieces. Systems will not include hard drives. Systems may or may not feature cosmetic damage. Game products will include the game disc(s). Games may or may not include a DVD or game case (will be shipped in a disc sleeve as alternative). Accessory products will include the accessory advertised and may or may not include product instruction manual. Game disc(s) may or may not feature slight scuffs and scratches per use. Game cases and accessories may be slightly dirty and/or feature pen marks and stickers (note, see refunds and return policy for Gamers Inc. product bar code information). This action is for a defective copy of the product only and will not include any additional accessories and it may or may not include additional content codes such as on line pass codes or additional down loadable content. As this item is defective, any content codes that may be included are not guaranteed to work (may be expired or previously used by original owner). Note: We cannot pull games by request for specific feature such as instruction manuals or working content codes. Depending on the game, some exceptions may be made, at our discretion. All photos are stock images unless otherwise specified. All games come with original cover art unless otherwise specified. Used games may, or may not, be Greatest Hits/Selects/Platinum Hits version. Additional Information about Sony PlayStation 2 Slim Charcoal Black Console (NTSC - SCPH-70012) Product Description Weighing just 900g, the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim is a lightweight entertainment hub that you can carry with you everywhere you go. With an enormous game library of over 1400 games, this Sony console gives you a wide variety to choose from. The integrated Ethernet and modem ports of this gaming console give you the liberty of online gaming anytime, anywhere. Add to your excitement with the high-resolution 3D graphics you get with the gravity, environmental elements and friction simulations introduced by the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim. The Dolby Digital AC-3 and DTS sound of this Sony console add to the realism. Whether it is killing your online foe or making your buddy eat dirt in a sports game, the Dualshock analog controller of this gaming console, with 255 sensitivity levels, makes it happen. Product Identifiers Brand Sony Product Name Sony PlayStation 2 Slim MPN SCPH-70012 Product Line Sony PlayStation General Type Console Color Charcoal Black Release Date 11/1/2004 Audio Audio Output Support Stereo Power & Battery Power Source Types Power Supply - internal Depth 6 in. Dimensions Height 1 in. Weight 2 lb Width 9 in. Display CPU MIPS R5900 Technical Details Ram Technology RDRAM (RAMBUS) Supported Media CD-ROM, DVD-ROM Ram Capacity 32 MB Region Code NTSC Graphic Memory Capacity 4 MB Features Country Region United States Manufacturer: *DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Black) PS2 - System Deck Only Model: Buyer/Bidder Please Note By bidding on our items, you are agreeing to pay for the item should you be the winning bidder (unfortunately, we do not accept NON-US PayPal payments, please DO NOT bid if your PayPal is NON-US). If you have an issue with a product, please message us through eBay messages before leaving feedback or opening a case. We will do our best to make things right. Products feature Gamers, Inc. retail labels and barcode. Please do not remove these stickers until you are 100% statisfied with the product. We do not accept retruns on products that are missing our labels. We currently ship only to the contiguous United States. We do not ship internationally, or to APOs, FPOs, U.S. territories, Alaska, or Hawaii at this time. Please do not bid if you are not located in the contiguous United States. To ensure that your item(s) are packaged correctly, please allow 1-3 business days for us to process your order. Before submitting payment, make sure that your shipping address is 100% accurate on eBay, as they are who provide us with the shipping address. We ship fast, and may not be able to change/update the address once the order process has begun. If the package is shipped incorrectly we will request payment for additional shipping attempts. We are not responsible for any delays due to an incorrect address. Wholesale lots and orders over one pound must have a physical address to ship to. We will contact buyers regarding a change or update of address as soon as we are made aware of the issue. If we do not receive an updated address from the buyer within a week of the date we sent a message, we will be forced to refund you minus a restocking fee of 15%. We offer shipping only and will not accommodate any kind of local pickup. Returns and Refunds We offer a 14-day, money back warranty on our products. To qualify for a return the product must be defective upon arrival and first play or have been damaged during shipping. Products must be returned in the exact condition in which it was sent/received. Brand new items must have the original box packaging, instructions, paperwork, ect. Our warranty do not cover customer abuse or neglect. This warranty does not cover the following products: Cheating devices (GameShark, Action Replay, ect.) Strategy Guides Wall Scrolls Apparel PC Games Wholesale lots Defective items (Unverified ESN iPhones, products listed as defective). For returns that are not defective, we will charge a 15% restocking fee which will be taken from the refund of the purchase amount. If you receive an item that is defective or was damaged during shipping, please let us know right away, before leaving feedback, and we will make it right! Please do not bid on our autions if your PayPal account is not a U.S. account. We will be forced to cancel your bids/orders. We ask that payment is submitted within seven (7) days of the auctions ends date. Please make sure you address is 100% accurate through your eBay account (that is the source that provides us your shipping address) before submitting payment. Please see Shipping Info for more information. We currently only accept payments to be made by PayPal. About Gamers, INC. Gamers, Inc. operates various video game retail locations in the Midwest. Specialising in used games and accessories for over 17 years, Gamers has allowed any customer to get in the game at an affordable cost. We have everything from Atari 2600 to Xbox 360, Game Gear to Nintendo 3DS and everything in between. Feel free to check out our other listings! We've got just about everything you want for your business, or personal collection to grow! The exact consoles you receive may or may not feature the same cosmetic defects shown here, such as cracks in the casings, discoloration, missing parts or pieces, missing faceplates, stickers, and so forth. Product Condition in Detail: * Defective - These products are used and sold in defective condition. These products are NOT in working condition and should be purchased with the intention for using them as parts or for repair. Defective items may be missing part and/or pieces. Systems will not include hard drives. Systems may or may not feature cosmetic damage. Game products will include the game disc(s). Games may or may not include a DVD or game case (will be shipped in a disc sleeve as alternative). Accessory products will include the accessory advertised and may or may not include product instruction manual. Game disc(s) may or may not feature slight scuffs and scratches per use. Game cases and accessories may be slightly dirty and/or feature pen marks and stickers (note, see refunds and return policy for Gamers Inc. product bar code information). This action is for a defective copy of the product only and will not include any additional accessories and it may or may not include additional content codes such as on line pass codes or additional down loadable content. As this item is defective, any content codes that may be included are not guaranteed to work (may be expired or previously used by original owner). Note: We cannot pull games by request for specific feature such as instruction manuals or working content codes. Depending on the game, some exceptions may be made, at our discretion. All photos are stock images unless otherwise specified. All games come with original cover art unless otherwise specified. Used games may, or may not, be Greatest Hits/Selects/Platinum Hits version. Additional Information about Sony PlayStation 2 Slim Silver Console (NTSC - SCPH-70012) Product Description Weighing just 900g, the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim is a lightweight entertainment hub that you can carry with you everywhere you go. With an enormous game library of over 1400 games, this Sony console gives you a wide variety to choose from. The integrated Ethernet and modem ports of this gaming console give you the liberty of online gaming anytime, anywhere. Add to your excitement with the high-resolution 3D graphics you get with the gravity, environmental elements and friction simulations introduced by the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim. The Dolby Digital AC-3 and DTS sound of this Sony console add to the realism. Whether it is killing your online foe or making your buddy eat dirt in a sports game, the Dualshock analog controller of this gaming console, with 255 sensitivity levels, makes it happen. Find more deals in our eBay store! FAQ Who will my item ship with? World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system. 149201083119836*DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Black) PS2 - System Deck OnlyItem Description Shipping Info Payment Info *DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Black) PS2 - System Deck Only Defective - For Parts or Repair Only! *DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Black) PS2 - System Deck Only This auction is for a defective black Playstation 2 slim console. Defects are sold in non-working condition and should be bought for parts or repair only. They may be missing parts or pieces. They will come with no power cords, controllers, accessories, or peripherals ("deck only"). Please be advised these photos are our own stock images to provide you with a good idea of what the consoles will look like. The exact consoles you receive may or may not feature the same cosmetic defects shown here, such as cracks in the casings, discoloration, missing parts or pieces, missing faceplates, stickers, and so forth. Product Condition in Detail: * Defective - These products are used and sold in defective condition. These products are NOT in working condition and should be purchased with the intention for using them as parts or for repair. Defective items may be missing part and/or pieces. Systems will not include hard drives. Systems may or may not feature cosmetic damage. Game products will include the game disc(s). Games may or may not include a DVD or game case (will be shipped in a disc sleeve as alternative). Accessory products will include the accessory advertised and may or may not include product instruction manual. Game disc(s) may or may not feature slight scuffs and scratches per use. Game cases and accessories may be slightly dirty and/or feature pen marks and stickers (note, see refunds and return policy for Gamers Inc. product bar code information). This action is for a defective copy of the product only and will not include any additional accessories and it may or may not include additional content codes such as on line pass codes or additional down loadable content. As this item is defective, any content codes that may be included are not guaranteed to work (may be expired or previously used by original owner). Note: We cannot pull games by request for specific feature such as instruction manuals or working content codes. Depending on the game, some exceptions may be made, at our discretion. All photos are stock images unless otherwise specified. All games come with original cover art unless otherwise specified. Used games may, or may not, be Greatest Hits/Selects/Platinum Hits version. Additional Information about Sony PlayStation 2 Slim Charcoal Black Console (NTSC - SCPH-70012) Product Description Weighing just 900g, the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim is a lightweight entertainment hub that you can carry with you everywhere you go. With an enormous game library of over 1400 games, this Sony console gives you a wide variety to choose from. The integrated Ethernet and modem ports of this gaming console give you the liberty of online gaming anytime, anywhere. Add to your excitement with the high-resolution 3D graphics you get with the gravity, environmental elements and friction simulations introduced by the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim. The Dolby Digital AC-3 and DTS sound of this Sony console add to the realism. Whether it is killing your online foe or making your buddy eat dirt in a sports game, the Dualshock analog controller of this gaming console, with 255 sensitivity levels, makes it happen. Product Identifiers Brand Sony Product Name Sony PlayStation 2 Slim MPN SCPH-70012 Product Line Sony PlayStation General Type Console Color Charcoal Black Release Date 11/1/2004 Audio Audio Output Support Stereo Power & Battery Power Source Types Power Supply - internal Depth 6 in. Dimensions Height 1 in. Weight 2 lb Width 9 in. Display CPU MIPS R5900 Technical Details Ram Technology RDRAM (RAMBUS) Supported Media CD-ROM, DVD-ROM Ram Capacity 32 MB Region Code NTSC Graphic Memory Capacity 4 MB Features Country Region United States Manufacturer: *DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Black) PS2 - System Deck Only Model: Buyer/Bidder Please Note By bidding on our items, you are agreeing to pay for the item should you be the winning bidder (unfortunately, we do not accept NON-US PayPal payments, please DO NOT bid if your PayPal is NON-US). If you have an issue with a product, please message us through eBay messages before leaving feedback or opening a case. We will do our best to make things right. Products feature Gamers, Inc. retail labels and barcode. Please do not remove these stickers until you are 100% statisfied with the product. We do not accept retruns on products that are missing our labels. We currently ship only to the contiguous United States. We do not ship internationally, or to APOs, FPOs, U.S. territories, Alaska, or Hawaii at this time. Please do not bid if you are not located in the contiguous United States. To ensure that your item(s) are packaged correctly, please allow 1-3 business days for us to process your order. Before submitting payment, make sure that your shipping address is 100% accurate on eBay, as they are who provide us with the shipping address. We ship fast, and may not be able to change/update the address once the order process has begun. If the package is shipped incorrectly we will request payment for additional shipping attempts. We are not responsible for any delays due to an incorrect address. Wholesale lots and orders over one pound must have a physical address to ship to. We will contact buyers regarding a change or update of address as soon as we are made aware of the issue. If we do not receive an updated address from the buyer within a week of the date we sent a message, we will be forced to refund you minus a restocking fee of 15%. We offer shipping only and will not accommodate any kind of local pickup. Returns and Refunds We offer a 14-day, money back warranty on our products. To qualify for a return the product must be defective upon arrival and first play or have been damaged during shipping. Products must be returned in the exact condition in which it was sent/received. Brand new items must have the original box packaging, instructions, paperwork, ect. Our warranty do not cover customer abuse or neglect. This warranty does not cover the following products: Cheating devices (GameShark, Action Replay, ect.) Strategy Guides Wall Scrolls Apparel PC Games Wholesale lots Defective items (Unverified ESN iPhones, products listed as defective). For returns that are not defective, we will charge a 15% restocking fee which will be taken from the refund of the purchase amount. If you receive an item that is defective or was damaged during shipping, please let us know right away, before leaving feedback, and we will make it right! Please do not bid on our autions if your PayPal account is not a U.S. account. We will be forced to cancel your bids/orders. We ask that payment is submitted within seven (7) days of the auctions ends date. Please make sure you address is 100% accurate through your eBay account (that is the source that provides us your shipping address) before submitting payment. Please see Shipping Info for more information. We currently only accept payments to be made by PayPal. About Gamers, INC. Gamers, Inc. operates various video game retail locations in the Midwest. Specialising in used games and accessories for over 17 years, Gamers has allowed any customer to get in the game at an affordable cost. We have everything from Atari 2600 to Xbox 360, Game Gear to Nintendo 3DS and everything in between. Feel free to check out our other listings! We've got just about everything you want for your business, or personal collection to grow! AS-IS ITEMS ARE SOLD WITH KNOWN PROBLEMS INCLUDING (BUT NOT LIMITED TO) ITEMS THAT ARE NON-FUNCTIONAL, PARTIALLY NON-FUNCTIONAL, OR ITEMS THAT HAVE NOT BEEN TESTED. WE DO OUR BEST TO DISCLOSE ANY PROBLEM OR DEFECTS WITH AN ITEM BUT THERE MAY BE MORE ISSUES THAN THOSE STATED IN THE DESCRIPTION. BIDDERS SHOULD NOT ASSUME AN AS-IS ITEM IS IN WORKING CONDITION. WE WILL ALWAYS DISCLOSE IF AN ITEMS IS TESTED, WORKING, FLAWED, OR AS IS. BIDDERS MUST ASK ALL QUESTIONS BEFORE THE AUCTION ENDS AND NOT ASSUME ANYTHING THAT IS NOT STATED. ALL AS-IS ITEMS ARE SOLD ONLY WITH WHAT IS PICTURED AND AS PICTURED. If there is ever any issue with your item, please contact us. We always do our best to take care of our customers. ALL AS IS items are sold AS IS. Please read the description very carefully and make a conscious decision when buying AS IS items. For all other items, if there is any issue at all, please contact us and we will offer a replacement, refund, or whatever is needed to ensure a positive transaction. We strive to sell quality products at quality prices. We never attempt to sell anything that is different than what is described. Please contact us if there is any issue and we will fix the situation. SHIPPING POLICY: We ship items using UPS Ground and UNITED STATES POSTAL SERVICE (USPS). Choice of shipping carrier is under our discretion, unless a preference is requested. If a specific carrier is needed this may change shipping charges as well as handling time. Bidders need to contact us as soon as an auction has ended. Contacting us before the auction ends is ideal. Additional charges may also apply if special packaging is required. If your package is returned to us because of an incorrect address or if you were not able to receive/accept your package, you will be responsible for any additional shipping charges. We ship to all 50 States in the US. There are extra charges for Hawaii, Alaska, and any US territories. Please contact us if further information or a shipping quote is needed. If shipped via UPS Hawaii, Alaska, and US territories We ONLY SHIP TO PAYPAL VERIFIED ADDRESSES. Please ensure that you eBay address is correct before the auction ends. We DO NOT ship to UPS, Fedex, or USPS store addresses for pickup. There is a 20% restocking fee on ALL RETURNS CUSTOMS, DUTIES, AND TAX RESPONSIBILITIES International buyers will be responsible for ALL customs fees, duty charges, and applicable taxes. When purchasing an item, the buyer agrees to paying these costs even though they are not listed on the final invoice. We WILL NOT change declaration value to anything but the sale price. We WILL NOT mark any items that are sold as gifts. We WILL NOT under insure packages to escape customs duties. All customs forms will be an accurate, truthful representation of what is being shipped with NO EXCEPTIONS. *International orders PAY RETURN SHIPPING on ALL RETURNS for ANY REASON!* There is a 20% restocking fee on ALL RETURNS.. SHIPPING DESTINATIONS: We ship to all 50 States in the US. Any large or heavy packages to sent to the continental US will be shipped by FedEx. Small or light packages sent to the continental US will be shipped USPS. Shipping to HAWAII or ALASKA can only be done through USPS If you have a preference of one or the other, contact us to see IF IT IS POSSIBLE and get a NEW RATE. *International orders PAY RETURN SHIPPING on ALL RETURNS for ANY REASON!* There is a 20% restocking fee on ALL RETURNS. WE DO NOT SHIP TO P.O. BOXES! We DO NOT ship to UPS or Fedex or USPS STORE addresses for pickup. Due to the many problems we have had with shipping to P.O. boxes we will no longer ship to them. The only exception being a signed release form, that we will send you. Also, your address MUST be verified through PayPal, no exceptions. LOCAL PICKUP: All customers are welcome to pick up their product in person at our store located in Detroit, MI provided that PRIOR ARRANGEMENTS with our eBay department have been made. All local pick up customers will be required to present a valid form of ID with the identical name that appears on their eBay account as well as SIGN an eBay invoice to verify the item was picked-up and is what was described. All *AS IS* items will also have to be signed for and the signature will be your agreement that the item is what was stated. Any items not picked-up after 30 days WILL be listed again or sold in our store unless prior arrangements have been made. You may make payment in store at the time of pickup if that is desired. PAYMENTS AND PROCESSING: PERSONAL CHECKS ARE NOT ACCEPTED. SALES TAX: We are required by law to collect sales tax on all auction items with a delivery address in Michigan. This applies to items which are picked up locally. The tax rate is 6%. Payment for all items is due within 4 days of the auctions ending date unless we are contacted and agree to a longer period. Payment can be made at our Detroit location if you are going to pick up the item in person. Invoices are ready at the close of auction UNLESS an adjusted invoice is needed. If an adjustment is needed please contact us via message to request the change. Photographs often describe the item better than words. We have made every reasonable effort to disclose any known defects. 157380896689848*DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Silver) PS2 - System Deck OnlyItem Description Shipping Info Payment Info *DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Silver) PS2 - System Deck Only Defective - For Parts or Repair Only! *DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Silver) PS2 - System Deck Only This auction is for a defective silver Playstation 2 slim console. Defects are sold in non-working condition and should be bought for parts or repair only. They may be missing parts or pieces. They will come with no power cords, controllers, accessories, or peripherals ("deck only"). Please be advised these photos are our own stock images to provide you with a good idea of what the consoles will look like. The exact consoles you receive may or may not feature the same cosmetic defects shown here, such as cracks in the casings, discoloration, missing parts or pieces, missing faceplates, stickers, and so forth. Product Condition in Detail: * Defective - These products are used and sold in defective condition. These products are NOT in working condition and should be purchased with the intention for using them as parts or for repair. Defective items may be missing part and/or pieces. Systems will not include hard drives. Systems may or may not feature cosmetic damage. Game products will include the game disc(s). Games may or may not include a DVD or game case (will be shipped in a disc sleeve as alternative). Accessory products will include the accessory advertised and may or may not include product instruction manual. Game disc(s) may or may not feature slight scuffs and scratches per use. Game cases and accessories may be slightly dirty and/or feature pen marks and stickers (note, see refunds and return policy for Gamers Inc. product bar code information). This action is for a defective copy of the product only and will not include any additional accessories and it may or may not include additional content codes such as on line pass codes or additional down loadable content. As this item is defective, any content codes that may be included are not guaranteed to work (may be expired or previously used by original owner). Note: We cannot pull games by request for specific feature such as instruction manuals or working content codes. Depending on the game, some exceptions may be made, at our discretion. All photos are stock images unless otherwise specified. All games come with original cover art unless otherwise specified. Used games may, or may not, be Greatest Hits/Selects/Platinum Hits version. Additional Information about Sony PlayStation 2 Slim Silver Console (NTSC - SCPH-70012) Product Description Weighing just 900g, the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim is a lightweight entertainment hub that you can carry with you everywhere you go. With an enormous game library of over 1400 games, this Sony console gives you a wide variety to choose from. The integrated Ethernet and modem ports of this gaming console give you the liberty of online gaming anytime, anywhere. Add to your excitement with the high-resolution 3D graphics you get with the gravity, environmental elements and friction simulations introduced by the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim. The Dolby Digital AC-3 and DTS sound of this Sony console add to the realism. Whether it is killing your online foe or making your buddy eat dirt in a sports game, the Dualshock analog controller of this gaming console, with 255 sensitivity levels, makes it happen. Product Identifiers Brand Sony Product Name Sony PlayStation 2 Slim MPN SCPH-70012 Product Line Sony PlayStation General Type Console Color Silver Release Date 11/1/2004 Audio Audio Output Support Stereo Power & Battery Power Source Types Power Supply - internal Depth 6 in. Dimensions Height 1 in. Weight 2 lb Width 9 in. Display CPU MIPS R5900 Technical Details Ram Technology RDRAM (RAMBUS) Supported Media CD-ROM, DVD-ROM Ram Capacity 32 MB Region Code NTSC Graphic Memory Capacity 4 MB Features Country Region United States Manufacturer: *DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Silver) PS2 - System Deck Only Model: Buyer/Bidder Please Note By bidding on our items, you are agreeing to pay for the item should you be the winning bidder (unfortunately, we do not accept NON-US PayPal payments, please DO NOT bid if your PayPal is NON-US). If you have an issue with a product, please message us through eBay messages before leaving feedback or opening a case. We will do our best to make things right. Products feature Gamers, Inc. retail labels and barcode. Please do not remove these stickers until you are 100% statisfied with the product. We do not accept retruns on products that are missing our labels. We currently ship only to the contiguous United States. We do not ship internationally, or to APOs, FPOs, U.S. territories, Alaska, or Hawaii at this time. Please do not bid if you are not located in the contiguous United States. To ensure that your item(s) are packaged correctly, please allow 1-3 business days for us to process your order. Before submitting payment, make sure that your shipping address is 100% accurate on eBay, as they are who provide us with the shipping address. We ship fast, and may not be able to change/update the address once the order process has begun. If the package is shipped incorrectly we will request payment for additional shipping attempts. We are not responsible for any delays due to an incorrect address. Wholesale lots and orders over one pound must have a physical address to ship to. We will contact buyers regarding a change or update of address as soon as we are made aware of the issue. If we do not receive an updated address from the buyer within a week of the date we sent a message, we will be forced to refund you minus a restocking fee of 15%. We offer shipping only and will not accommodate any kind of local pickup. Returns and Refunds We offer a 14-day, money back warranty on our products. To qualify for a return the product must be defective upon arrival and first play or have been damaged during shipping. Products must be returned in the exact condition in which it was sent/received. Brand new items must have the original box packaging, instructions, paperwork, ect. Our warranty do not cover customer abuse or neglect. This warranty does not cover the following products: Cheating devices (GameShark, Action Replay, ect.) Strategy Guides Wall Scrolls Apparel PC Games Wholesale lots Defective items (Unverified ESN iPhones, products listed as defective). For returns that are not defective, we will charge a 15% restocking fee which will be taken from the refund of the purchase amount. If you receive an item that is defective or was damaged during shipping, please let us know right away, before leaving feedback, and we will make it right! Please do not bid on our autions if your PayPal account is not a U.S. account. We will be forced to cancel your bids/orders. We ask that payment is submitted within seven (7) days of the auctions ends date. Please make sure you address is 100% accurate through your eBay account (that is the source that provides us your shipping address) before submitting payment. Please see Shipping Info for more information. We currently only accept payments to be made by PayPal. About Gamers, INC. Gamers, Inc. operates various video game retail locations in the Midwest. Specialising in used games and accessories for over 17 years, Gamers has allowed any customer to get in the game at an affordable cost. We have everything from Atari 2600 to Xbox 360, Game Gear to Nintendo 3DS and everything in between. Feel free to check out our other listings! We've got just about everything you want for your business, or personal collection to grow! If we do not receive an updated address from the buyer within a week of the date we sent a message, we will be forced to refund you minus a restocking fee of 15%. We offer shipping only and will not accommodate any kind of local pickup. Returns and Refunds We offer a 14-day, money back warranty on our products. To qualify for a return the product must be defective upon arrival and first play or have been damaged during shipping. Products must be returned in the exact condition in which it was sent/received. Brand new items must have the original box packaging, instructions, paperwork, ect. Our warranty do not cover customer abuse or neglect. This warranty does not cover the following products: Cheating devices (GameShark, Action Replay, ect.) Strategy Guides Wall Scrolls Apparel PC Games Wholesale lots Defective items (Unverified ESN iPhones, products listed as defective). For returns that are not defective, we will charge a 15% restocking fee which will be taken from the refund of the purchase amount. If you receive an item that is defective or was damaged during shipping, please let us know right away, before leaving feedback, and we will make it right! Please do not bid on our autions if your PayPal account is not a U.S. account. We will be forced to cancel your bids/orders. We ask that payment is submitted within seven (7) days of the auctions ends date. Please make sure you address is 100% accurate through your eBay account (that is the source that provides us your shipping address) before submitting payment. Please see Shipping Info for more information. We currently only accept payments to be made by PayPal. About Gamers, INC. Gamers, Inc. operates various video game retail locations in the Midwest. Should any issue arise please contact us and we will do our best to ensure a speedy and satisfactory response. Our current office hours are Monday through Friday 9am to 5pm EST. Inquiries made outside of these hours will be answered as soon as possible. PAYMENTS Payments must be made through Paypal. Payment must be received within 7 days of the auction's end. Items left unpaid for more than 7 days are eligible to be relisted and/or have an unpaid item claim filed. SHIPPING Please be aware of our shipping charges prior to placing a bid. Items are typically shipped within two business days of receipt of payment. You will be notified when your item has been shipped. We are not responsible for shipping and/or delivery delays resulting from factors outside of our control, including acts of nature, strikes, etc. Combined Shipping: We offer combined shipping. Please email after the auction's end requesting a revised / combined invoice. Requests for combined shipping will be handled on a case by case basis. It may not be possible to combine certain larger items if we feel it may jeopardize a safe arrival. Local Pick up: We offer local pick up in some locations. Please email after auctions end to request local pick up. Local pick up items must be paid for in advance via Paypal and you must show your Paypal receipt at the time of pick up. Local pick up items left unclaimed for longer than 21 days will be refunded and relisted. We are currently not offering international shipping. Orders with international shipping addresses will be refunded and the items relisted. Items offered for sale in As-Is or in For Parts/Repair/Not Working condition are final sale only. GENERAL We reserve the right to end an auction at any time. We endeavor to provide accurate descriptions of all items. If you feel that an item was received in a condition other than as described, please contact us so that we may assist you. World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2135.0
