178201082711373*DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Silver) PS2 - System Deck OnlyItem Description Shipping Info Payment Info *DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Silver) PS2 - System Deck Only Defective - For Parts or Repair Only! *DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Silver) PS2 - System Deck Only This auction is for a defective silver Playstation 2 slim console. Defects are sold in non-working condition and should be bought for parts or repair only. They may be missing parts or pieces. They will come with no power cords, controllers, accessories, or peripherals ("deck only"). Please be advised these photos are our own stock images to provide you with a good idea of what the consoles will look like. The exact consoles you receive may or may not feature the same cosmetic defects shown here, such as cracks in the casings, discoloration, missing parts or pieces, missing faceplates, stickers, and so forth. Product Condition in Detail: * Defective - These products are used and sold in defective condition. These products are NOT in working condition and should be purchased with the intention for using them as parts or for repair. Defective items may be missing part and/or pieces. Systems will not include hard drives. Systems may or may not feature cosmetic damage. Game products will include the game disc(s). Games may or may not include a DVD or game case (will be shipped in a disc sleeve as alternative). Accessory products will include the accessory advertised and may or may not include product instruction manual. Game disc(s) may or may not feature slight scuffs and scratches per use. Game cases and accessories may be slightly dirty and/or feature pen marks and stickers (note, see refunds and return policy for Gamers Inc. product bar code information). This action is for a defective copy of the product only and will not include any additional accessories and it may or may not include additional content codes such as on line pass codes or additional down loadable content. As this item is defective, any content codes that may be included are not guaranteed to work (may be expired or previously used by original owner). Note: We cannot pull games by request for specific feature such as instruction manuals or working content codes. Depending on the game, some exceptions may be made, at our discretion. All photos are stock images unless otherwise specified. All games come with original cover art unless otherwise specified. Used games may, or may not, be Greatest Hits/Selects/Platinum Hits version. Additional Information about Sony PlayStation 2 Slim Silver Console (NTSC - SCPH-70012) Product Description Weighing just 900g, the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim is a lightweight entertainment hub that you can carry with you everywhere you go. With an enormous game library of over 1400 games, this Sony console gives you a wide variety to choose from. The integrated Ethernet and modem ports of this gaming console give you the liberty of online gaming anytime, anywhere. Add to your excitement with the high-resolution 3D graphics you get with the gravity, environmental elements and friction simulations introduced by the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim. The Dolby Digital AC-3 and DTS sound of this Sony console add to the realism. Whether it is killing your online foe or making your buddy eat dirt in a sports game, the Dualshock analog controller of this gaming console, with 255 sensitivity levels, makes it happen. Product Identifiers Brand Sony Product Name Sony PlayStation 2 Slim MPN SCPH-70012 Product Line Sony PlayStation General Type Console Color Silver Release Date 11/1/2004 Audio Audio Output Support Stereo Power & Battery Power Source Types Power Supply - internal Depth 6 in. Dimensions Height 1 in. Weight 2 lb Width 9 in. Display CPU MIPS R5900 Technical Details Ram Technology RDRAM (RAMBUS) Supported Media CD-ROM, DVD-ROM Ram Capacity 32 MB Region Code NTSC Graphic Memory Capacity 4 MB Features Country Region United States Manufacturer: *DEFECTIVE* Sony Playstation 2 Slim (Silver) PS2 - System Deck Only Model: Buyer/Bidder Please Note By bidding on our items, you are agreeing to pay for the item should you be the winning bidder (unfortunately, we do not accept NON-US PayPal payments, please DO NOT bid if your PayPal is NON-US). If you have an issue with a product, please message us through eBay messages before leaving feedback or opening a case. We will do our best to make things right. Products feature Gamers, Inc. retail labels and barcode. Please do not remove these stickers until you are 100% statisfied with the product. We do not accept retruns on products that are missing our labels. We currently ship only to the contiguous United States. We do not ship internationally, or to APOs, FPOs, U.S. territories, Alaska, or Hawaii at this time. Please do not bid if you are not located in the contiguous United States. To ensure that your item(s) are packaged correctly, please allow 1-3 business days for us to process your order. Before submitting payment, make sure that your shipping address is 100% accurate on eBay, as they are who provide us with the shipping address. We ship fast, and may not be able to change/update the address once the order process has begun. If the package is shipped incorrectly we will request payment for additional shipping attempts. We are not responsible for any delays due to an incorrect address. Wholesale lots and orders over one pound must have a physical address to ship to. If you have an issue with a product, please message us through eBay messages before leaving feedback or opening a case. We will do our best to make things right. Products feature Gamers, Inc. retail labels and barcode. Please do not remove these stickers until you are 100% statisfied with the product. We do not accept retruns on products that are missing our labels. We currently ship only to the contiguous United States. We do not ship internationally, or to APOs, FPOs, U.S. territories, Alaska, or Hawaii at this time. Please do not bid if you are not located in the contiguous United States. To ensure that your item(s) are packaged correctly, please allow 1-3 business days for us to process your order. Before submitting payment, make sure that your shipping address is 100% accurate on eBay, as they are who provide us with the shipping address. We ship fast, and may not be able to change/update the address once the order process has begun. If the package is shipped incorrectly we will request payment for additional shipping attempts. We are not responsible for any delays due to an incorrect address. Wholesale lots and orders over one pound must have a physical address to ship to. We will contact buyers regarding a change or update of address as soon as we are made aware of the issue. If we do not receive an updated address from the buyer within a week of the date we sent a message, we will be forced to refund you minus a restocking fee of 15%. We offer shipping only and will not accommodate any kind of local pickup. Returns and Refunds We offer a 14-day, money back warranty on our products. To qualify for a return the product must be defective upon arrival and first play or have been damaged during shipping. Products must be returned in the exact condition in which it was sent/received. Brand new items must have the original box packaging, instructions, paperwork, ect. Our warranty do not cover customer abuse or neglect. This warranty does not cover the following products: Cheating devices (GameShark, Action Replay, ect.) Strategy Guides Wall Scrolls Apparel PC Games Wholesale lots Defective items (Unverified ESN iPhones, products listed as defective). For returns that are not defective, we will charge a 15% restocking fee which will be taken from the refund of the purchase amount. If you receive an item that is defective or was damaged during shipping, please let us know right away, before leaving feedback, and we will make it right! Please do not bid on our autions if your PayPal account is not a U.S. account. We will be forced to cancel your bids/orders. We ask that payment is submitted within seven (7) days of the auctions ends date. Please make sure you address is 100% accurate through your eBay account (that is the source that provides us your shipping address) before submitting payment. Please see Shipping Info for more information. We currently only accept payments to be made by PayPal. About Gamers, INC. Gamers, Inc. operates various video game retail locations in the Midwest. Specialising in used games and accessories for over 17 years, Gamers has allowed any customer to get in the game at an affordable cost. We have everything from Atari 2600 to Xbox 360, Game Gear to Nintendo 3DS and everything in between. Feel free to check out our other listings! Find more deals in our eBay store! FAQ Who will my item ship with? World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2127.5

Defects are sold in non-working condition and should be bought for parts or repair only. They may be missing parts or pieces. They will come with no power cords, controllers, accessories, or peripherals ("deck only"). Please be advised these photos are our own stock images to provide you with a good idea of what the consoles will look like. The exact consoles you receive may or may not feature the same cosmetic defects shown here, such as cracks in the casings, discoloration, missing parts or pieces, missing faceplates, stickers, and so forth. Product Condition in Detail: * Defective - These products are used and sold in defective condition. These products are NOT in working condition and should be purchased with the intention for using them as parts or for repair. Defective items may be missing part and/or pieces. Systems will not include hard drives. Systems may or may not feature cosmetic damage. Game products will include the game disc(s). Games may or may not include a DVD or game case (will be shipped in a disc sleeve as alternative). Accessory products will include the accessory advertised and may or may not include product instruction manual. Game disc(s) may or may not feature slight scuffs and scratches per use. Game cases and accessories may be slightly dirty and/or feature pen marks and stickers (note, see refunds and return policy for Gamers Inc. product bar code information). This action is for a defective copy of the product only and will not include any additional accessories and it may or may not include additional content codes such as on line pass codes or additional down loadable content. As this item is defective, any content codes that may be included are not guaranteed to work (may be expired or previously used by original owner). Note: We cannot pull games by request for specific feature such as instruction manuals or working content codes. Depending on the game, some exceptions may be made, at our discretion. All photos are stock images unless otherwise specified. All games come with original cover art unless otherwise specified. Used games may, or may not, be Greatest Hits/Selects/Platinum Hits version. Additional Information about Sony PlayStation 2 Slim Silver Console (NTSC - SCPH-70012) Product Description Weighing just 900g, the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim is a lightweight entertainment hub that you can carry with you everywhere you go. With an enormous game library of over 1400 games, this Sony console gives you a wide variety to choose from. The integrated Ethernet and modem ports of this gaming console give you the liberty of online gaming anytime, anywhere. Add to your excitement with the high-resolution 3D graphics you get with the gravity, environmental elements and friction simulations introduced by the Sony PlayStation 2 Slim. The Dolby Digital AC-3 and DTS sound of this Sony console add to the realism. Whether it is killing your online foe or making your buddy eat dirt in a sports game, the Dualshock analog controller of this gaming console, with 255 sensitivity levels, makes it happen. Find more deals in our eBay store! FAQ Who will my item ship with? World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system. Sales Tax will be collected on the entire invoice amount for items shipping to the following states: Florida, Minnesota, Nevada, New York, North Carolina, Oklahoma and Texas. Find your estimated sales tax rates on the table under shipping & payments. World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2147.5

The item works great. (See Pictures) Functionality: The console and accessories have been fully tested and are working. What's in the Box: PlayStation 4 System (Jet Black), One DUALSHOCK-4 Wireless Controller, HDMI Cable, Power Cable, USB Charging Cable and Manual. Packaging: Retail Box (The packaging does have some wear from previous use and handling) Platform: Sony Playstation 4 Warranty: 30 Days Special Notes: Model CUH-1001A No Alaska, Hawaii, PO Box, or APO/FPO Delivery Available for This Item. From the Manufacturer: Product Description PlayStation 4 is the best place to play with dynamic, connected gaming, powerful graphics and speed, intelligent personalization, deeply integrated social capabilities, and innovative second-screen features. Combining unparalleled content, immersive gaming experiences, all of your favorite digital entertainment apps, and PlayStation exclusives, PS4 centers on gamers, enabling them to play when, where and how they want. PS4 enables the greatest game developers in the world to unlock their creativity and push the boundaries of play through a system that is tuned specifically to their needs. The PS4 system is centered around a powerful custom chip that contains eight x86-64 cores and a state of the art 1.84 TFLOPS graphics processor with 8 GB of ultra-fast GDDR5 unified system memory, easing game creation and increasing the richness of content achievable on the platform. The end result is new games with rich, high-fidelity graphics and deeply immersive experiences. Official PS4 specifications: Main Processor: Single-chip custom processor CPU: x86-64 AMD 'Jaguar' 8 cores GPU: 1.84 TFLOPS, AMD next-generation Radeon based graphics engine Memory: GDDR5 8GB Hard Disk Drive: Built-in Optical Drive (read only): BD 6xCAV DVD 8xCAV I/O and communication: Super-Speed USB (USB 3.0) AUX Ethernet (10BASE-T, 100BASE-TX, 1000BASE-T) IEEE 802.11 b/g/n Bluetooth 2.1 (EDR) AV output: HDMI Analog-AV out Digital Output (optical) DUALSHOCK Controller: DUALSHOCK 4 features new innovations to deliver more immersive gaming experiences, including a highly sensitive six-axis sensor as well as a touch pad located on the top of the controller, which offers gamers completely new ways to play and interact with games. Find more deals in our eBay store! FAQ Who will my item ship with? World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system. 256281321402826Sony PlayStation 3 40 GB Piano Black Console (NTSC - CECH-G01)This is one of the greatest gaming machines I have ever used. I bought it about 8 months ago because I had encountered a problem with the video card in my PS3 Slim. The fat consoles, like this one, seem to be able to avoid that problem because the CPU that controls the fan prefers to keep the console cool. This helps preserve the console and make sure it works properly, at the expense of a little added noise. Anyway, like I was saying, I have never had a problem with this console and I probably played it for about 8 hours on an occasion or two, needless to say, it performed great. The only reason I am selling it is because I need extra money for my car and I am also getting a little old for video games. Upon purchase I will ship the console, 2 controllers (the black one has a loose joystick cover), an extra long charging cable, the power cord and an HDMI cord.Thank you for viewing my item for sale and good luck bidding for it!Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2120.0

Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2123.49

Find more deals in our eBay store! FAQ Who will my item ship with? World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system. We will not honor any claim of DOA or PROBLEMS if not reported to us within 14 business days (weekends are not business days) WE DO RECORD THE SERIAL NUMBER OF ALL ITEMS BEFORE SHIPPING, AND WILL VERIFY UPON RETURN.FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS I KNOW YOU SAY NO CUSTOMER PICK-UPS BUT I LIVE REALLY CLOSE, CAN I PICK UP THE ITEM? Sure, if you register a username with that address! Otherwise, if you are registered in Canada, you will not be able to bid.I ASKED A QUESTION ON FRIDAY NIGHT AND ITS NOW SUNDAY AND THERE IS NO RESPONSE! WHY WONT YOU ANSWER? We are not in the office on the weekends, but we will get to your questions as soon as possible. Sometimes we have a lot of questions and we go through them in the order they are received.MY KID/HUSBAND/WIFE/DOG/CAT/GHOST BID ON AN ITEM WITHOUT ME KNOWING AND I DONT WANT THE ITEM, DO I HAVE TO PAY? No further testing was completed. The warranty seal is intact/unbroken. Physically in good condition with some minor scratches and wear. This includes the console only. Sorry no games, controllers, wiring or additional accessories are included. For parts or repair. Sold As-Is, Non-Returnable and Non-Refundable. Your satisfaction is our #1 Priority! We strive for 5 STAR DSR service! Please read the Item Description Above CAREFULLY. A majority of the items listed on this account are either: untested, non-working, cosmetically damaged or missing accessories. We always attempt to list all known details about every item. We are unable to test each individual function & feature. It's always possible there may be an underlying issue(s) that we were unaware of to include in the description. Please do not bid or purchase the item unless you intend to fix it or use for parts. These items are meant for professional buyers. Sold on an As-Is basis with NO Returns and NO Refunds. If there is a problem with your order, please email and we will do our best to get the problem solved as quickly as possible. If we cannot correct the issue through communication then we will ask for the item to be returned. If we are in error or have grossly underdescribed an item we will be happy to issue a full refund after the item has been returned. Items returned because you have changed your mind or ordered the wrong thing will be charged a 10% restocking fee plus our actual shipping cost. Upon return all items are tested to verify the customers issue. For security purposes All Serial Numbers Are Recorded! Shipping: Cost: FREE shipping within the U.S. unless otherwise stated For international delivery please use the shipping calculator below for an exact quote. Packaging: All orders are carefully and securely packaged utilizing recycled and environmentally friendly supplies whenever possible. Shipping Time: We ship Monday-Friday. Orders are generally processed and shipped within 72 hours of receiving cleared payment. Delivery Time: Priority Mail generally takes 2-5 days, First Class Mail 2-7 days, Media Mail 3-21 days, UPS Ground 3-10 days after the package has been shipped. International delivery generally runs 7-21 days. However, there may be additional delays due to customs clearance. Tracking: Delivery Confirmation/Tracking is automatically included at no additional cost to the buyer. International: International buyers are responsible for any taxes, customs or brokerage fees in addition to the shipping cost. Generally the additional charges are collected when the package is delivered. As required by law, all customs paperwork will be filled out with the correct purchase amount. Please do not ask for it to be reduced or marked as a gift. Payment: Paypal (MC, Visa, Discover, AMEX and e-Check) Terms: Buyer is responsible to submit payment for the winning bid plus any applicable shipping charges within three days from auction end. Unless previous arrangements are made, after seven days a Non-Paying Bidder Alert will be filed with Ebay. 341131177832979Sony PS3 PlayStation 3 80GB Console CECHH01 3.55 Firmware, Works!!This is a CECHH01, with official 3.55 Firmware, and an upgraded 80GB hard drive. Works great, and the system is in really great condition (no controllers or Cables included). 30 day warranty included!!! If you get YLOD, return it to me, and I'll fix it for free! *Does not extend to Blu Ray drive or other components* This PS3 was professionally reballed by me, which means that the crappy lead-free solder that fastens the RSX GPU chip to the motherboard was removed, and the solder was replaced with fresh leaded solder. I also replaced all of the dried-up old thermal paste that was put there by Sony. Theoretically, this machine should be more robust than an brand new one. Research this for yourself if you don't believe me. This PS3 runs nice and cool, and quiet. Tech details:PS3 CECHH01Sony Official Firmware 3.5580GB Hard Drive.Professionally Reballed the RSX GPU.The original heat-sink compound was removed and replaced. ConditionExcellent, grade A in appearance and grade A in function. There are some swirl marks on top, but overall it looks great.The inside was thoroughly cleaned.Blu Ray drive works perfectly, and reads everything I threw at it.Front USB, and all rear ports ports function.Unit has been play-tested. What's included?PS3 CECHH01 Console80GB Hard Drive30 day YLOD warranty I cannot offer refunds on these used consoles. I do guarantee them against DOA, which means that if it does not work the first time you try it, right after you unpack it, I will fix it or replace it. It's not new, and even brand new PS3s fail, because they have multiple design flaws that i have no control over. If it gets YLOD within a 30 day period, I will fix it for free (You pay for shipping both ways). Other hardware issues are covered by my DOA policy, but not the warranty. Outside of that warranty period, I will happily fix problems for you at my normal repair rate. I ship on business days ONLY....so if you win an auction over the weekend, be assured that I will ship on Monday.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles3165.0

World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles298.0

358131177431234Sony Playstation 3 Super Slim PS3 500GB500 GB1 ControllerCables The new PlayStation 3 Superslim sports a retro look. The matte black finish on the grooved panel running across the top of the console reminds us of the Atari 2600, while the top loading disc drive brings back memories of playing Sonic CD on the redesigned Sega CD in the early 90s.Weighing just 4.6lb (2.1kg), the Super Slim is three pounds lighter than the PS3 Slim and is approximately 20 percent smaller and thinner than previous models, measuring 11.4" 2.3" 9" (29 6 23 cm). The sleek curved frame, small size and lightweight doesnt make any difference to the performance of the new console (unless youre planning on moving your PS3 around frequently), but if you have limited space in your T.V. cabinet, it does fit quite snugly among your other devices without taking up too much space.The major design change comes courtesy of the Blu-ray drive. The grooved central panel on top of the console, which is encased top and bottom by the familiar dust-collecting glossy black plastic styling of previous models, isn't just part of the new aesthetic. In this latest revision, you have to physically place the disc into the Blu-ray drive and then manually slide the loading tray from right to left to close it, so the ridges give your fingertips something to grasp as you close the panel.Though we like the overall design, the build quality of the loading panel doesnt instil us with confidence as the plastic sliding panel is quite thin and flimsy; we do worry that it will break over long term use, or if we close it too vigorously. Manually having to close the panel feels a little bit awkward and clunky too when compared to the way you simply tease the mouth of other PS3 models with your game disc and watch it smoothly swallow it up. Elsewhere, all the main features on the PS3 are present, including the AC adaptor port, Optical out, RCA, Ethernet and HDMI slots on the rear of the console, as well an air vent that to ensure it doesnt overheat. On the front panel are two USB ports on the bottom left-hand side, and the on/off switch on the right, which lights up either green or red depending on its current status. Theres a small design change on the front panel as the on/off switch now sits on a slightly protruding toggle bar measuring around six inches. Pressing the right hand-side of that bar turns the console on and off and pressing the left-hand side opens up the disc-loading tray, though this can also be done manually.In the box, you get the wireless DualShock 3 controller and charging cable, a composite A/V cable and power cable. Once again, the bundle disappointingly doesnt include a HDMI cable which youll have to buy separately if you want to get the most out of the 1080p/1080i/720p display. The Superslim is said to produce less power than previous models, with a 190W power supply replacing the 250W supply of the most recent Slim models, but internally you still have the same RSX GPU drive and 45nm Cell processor. The Superslim currently comes with a hefty 500GB harddrive, which is a good size for storing lots of data. In terms of performance, there doesnt appear to be any difference between the Superslim and the previous models as loading times are identical. However, it is noticeably quieter than any previous SKU with very quiet whirring sounds even when you first load a discVideo Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles4180.0

Pretty much anything that takes a battery; Used batteries are variable; they can last a few minutes, or they can last a few hours. It is impossible for us to test and guarantee each and every battery's length of charge. We test that all batteries hold a charge at the time of purchase, however we do not time how long they hold a charge. Therefore, it is our policy to guarantee that your battery will hold a charge but not the length of that charge. Our Guarantee Our Mission Payment & Shipping Return Conditions FAQ Payment & Shipping PayPal is the ONLY form of payment that we accept. Please pay within 24 hours of auction close to ensure fast shipping. If payment is not received within 4 days of auction close, an unpaid item dispute will be filed. If payment is not made within 8 days of auction close the item will no longer be available for purchase. Items normally ship within 24 business hours of receiving cleared payment, but may ship on the same day if the item is paid for by 7AM CST. We ship 5 days a week, Monday through Friday. If you order and pay for an item on Friday, Saturday, Sunday, or during a holiday your item will not ship out until the following Monday or business day. Also, we can NOT change a shipping address once an order is processed under any circumstances, so please make sure you have entered the correct shipping address before completing your purchase. We must ship the item to the PayPal verified address on the order. We also do not offer any sort of local pickup option. Small electronics with a value under $150 and weight under 13 ounces that are eligible, will be shipped for FREE, and may be shipped via USPS First Class Mail or UPS Ground (normally takes 2-5 days to arrive depending on your location). Items shipped USPS will leave the facility on the following business day after the label is printed, due to our pickup schedule. All items with a Value over $150 are shipped via UPS Ground (normally takes 2-6 days to arrive) with Signature Required upon delivery. WE DO NOT SHIP INTERNATIONALLY, SO PLEASE DON'T ASK. Our Guarantee Our Mission Payment & Shipping Return Conditions FAQ Return Conditions Terms & Conditions & Return Policy We describe electronic devices to the best of our ability. We diagnose units as well and thoroughly as possible and our diagnoses are typically correct. We do not show ESNs or IMEIs in the listings because they are guaranteed to be clear. Accessories included with items may not be OEM. Also, due to the nature of used electronic devices, we cannot guarantee battery life. Return Policy Please read carefully: We have a 30 day warranty on all USED items, that the item is as described in the listing above. Items must be returned in the condition in which they were sold, so this warranty does not cover damage caused by customer misuse or neglect. After 30 days, we are no longer able to accept a return. In the unlikely event there is a problem with your order, PLEASE CONTACT US PRIOR TO LEAVING PERMANENT FEEDBACK, as we are very responsive and quick to fix any problems. 1. Please inspect item and notify us within 30 days if there are any issues. 2. To return a defective item, contact us for an RMA number and prepaid return shipping label. Returns sent back at your own expense cannot be reimbursed. Please include RMA number and eBay name in return package for faster processing. 3. To return non-defective items, a 15% restocking fee will apply. Electronics cannot be returned due to carrier incompatibility or physical condition. Some phones require that you have a data plan; we do not allow returns due to incompatibility with your plan, please check with your carrier before bidding. The item must be returned in the same condition as how it was received including all accessories and packing materials. If any item is missing from the original package a fee will be applied for the cost of the replacement. Contact us for an RMA number, we are not responsible for returns sent without our prior knowledge. 4. Once we receive the return, our diagnosis team will verify the defect and issue a refund within 5 business days. (If stated defective item is found to be fully working, a 15% restocking fee will apply retroactively.) 5. NOTE: We do not ship internationally. Buyer assumes 100% liability for any items that leave the USA. We do not offer any partial refunds for repairs and will require that the device be sent back to us (at buyer's expense) if a problem arises. Please be aware of this when purchasing. Thank you. RETURNS OR EXCHANGES ARE NOT ALLOWED ON BROKEN ITEMS. Broken items are sold 'as-is' for parts or repair. No guarantees are made on anything broken. All broken item purchases are made at the bidders risk completely. Our Guarantee Our Mission Payment & Shipping Return Conditions FAQ FAQ Frequently Asked Questions Please read the following to see if your question might be answered here. If a question is asked that is answered either here or within the listing, we may not respond to your inquiry. Thank you. Q: Has my item been shipped yet? A: We ship items on the next applicable business day after payment. We ship 5 days a week, Monday through Friday. If you order and pay for an item on Friday, Saturday, Sunday, or during a holiday your item will not ship out until the following Monday or business day. Please see the Payment & Shipping tab for more information. Q: Do you ship internationally? A: We do not ship internationally at this time. Q: When will I receive my refund? A: It typically takes 1 to 5 business days for us to check in, process, and test your return, depending on our amount of inbound shipments. If it has been more than 5 days since the tracking shows that we received your return, please contact us. Q: Can you go any lower on this phone? / Will you accept an offer? A: The prices that we have listed are the lowest that we can offer at this time. Q: Does this phone come with a charger? A: The listing description will display all of the accessories that are included or not included with that item. Q: Is this phone unlocked? A: Devices are locked to the wireless carrier listed in the title, unless it explicitly states that they are unlocked. We do not support the process of unlocking and will not be able to accept a return for the inability to unlock a device. Q: I live close by, can I come pick it up? A: We are not offering local pickup as a shipping option and have no plans to do so in the future. Q: Do you include an invoice in the package? A: In an effort to remain green, we do not include paper invoices with our shipments. Q: Is this a picture of the actual phone? Can you email me more pictures? A: Due to the large amount of devices we process on a daily basis, it is logistically impossible to photograph every single device. You will either receive the device from the photograph or one of very similar condition. We try to be as objective as possible when listing our items and describing the condition, so that you may feel comfortable knowing what you are purchasing. Q: Can you send me the ESN? Is the ESN clean? A: We do not give out ESN numbers. We verify and guarantee that all of our ESN's & IMEI numbers are clean and ready to be activated with the listed carrier. We stand by them 100%, and if for any reason the carrier will not activate the item, we will give you a full refund. Q: Why do you charge sales tax in so many states? A: Our parent company has nexus in all 50 states, so we are required to charge sales tax everywhere, not just in our home state of Texas. Helpful Links More Items! Find more deals in our eBay store! FAQ Who will my item ship with? World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2114.5

Find more deals in our eBay store! FAQ Who will my item ship with? World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2113.5
426131177427420Sony Playstation 3 Super Slim PS3 500GB500 GB1 ControllerCables The new PlayStation 3 Superslim sports a retro look. The matte black finish on the grooved panel running across the top of the console reminds us of the Atari 2600, while the top loading disc drive brings back memories of playing Sonic CD on the redesigned Sega CD in the early 90s.Weighing just 4.6lb (2.1kg), the Super Slim is three pounds lighter than the PS3 Slim and is approximately 20 percent smaller and thinner than previous models, measuring 11.4" 2.3" 9" (29 6 23 cm). The sleek curved frame, small size and lightweight doesnt make any difference to the performance of the new console (unless youre planning on moving your PS3 around frequently), but if you have limited space in your T.V. cabinet, it does fit quite snugly among your other devices without taking up too much space.The major design change comes courtesy of the Blu-ray drive. The grooved central panel on top of the console, which is encased top and bottom by the familiar dust-collecting glossy black plastic styling of previous models, isn't just part of the new aesthetic. In this latest revision, you have to physically place the disc into the Blu-ray drive and then manually slide the loading tray from right to left to close it, so the ridges give your fingertips something to grasp as you close the panel.Though we like the overall design, the build quality of the loading panel doesnt instil us with confidence as the plastic sliding panel is quite thin and flimsy; we do worry that it will break over long term use, or if we close it too vigorously. Manually having to close the panel feels a little bit awkward and clunky too when compared to the way you simply tease the mouth of other PS3 models with your game disc and watch it smoothly swallow it up. Elsewhere, all the main features on the PS3 are present, including the AC adaptor port, Optical out, RCA, Ethernet and HDMI slots on the rear of the console, as well an air vent that to ensure it doesnt overheat. On the front panel are two USB ports on the bottom left-hand side, and the on/off switch on the right, which lights up either green or red depending on its current status. Theres a small design change on the front panel as the on/off switch now sits on a slightly protruding toggle bar measuring around six inches. Pressing the right hand-side of that bar turns the console on and off and pressing the left-hand side opens up the disc-loading tray, though this can also be done manually.In the box, you get the wireless DualShock 3 controller and charging cable, a composite A/V cable and power cable. Once again, the bundle disappointingly doesnt include a HDMI cable which youll have to buy separately if you want to get the most out of the 1080p/1080i/720p display. The Superslim is said to produce less power than previous models, with a 190W power supply replacing the 250W supply of the most recent Slim models, but internally you still have the same RSX GPU drive and 45nm Cell processor. The Superslim currently comes with a hefty 500GB harddrive, which is a good size for storing lots of data. In terms of performance, there doesnt appear to be any difference between the Superslim and the previous models as loading times are identical. However, it is noticeably quieter than any previous SKU with very quiet whirring sounds even when you first load a discVideo Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles4145.35

If we differ on the interpretation of the item condition, I reserve the right to have an independent trained third party re-evaluate it. Should the third party find we have not properly disclosed all relevant facts and photographed the pertinent area, I will give a full refund in exchange for the item. Otherwise, the customer will be charged a restocking fee of 25%. I will accept returns for up to 100% of the purchased price in store credit for items that fail to meet the description and/or are not consistent with the photographs. I require returning the item in its original packaging in order for the return to be to processed. Items returned from buyer's remorse, in condition other then sent, with missing pieces, or without papers or tags, will be assessed a 25% restocking fee. Depending on the circumstances a store credit or partial refunds will be given. In the event that there has been a mistake and the wrong item has been sent, we must be notified within 3 days of delivery and the item must be posted back to us within 7 days of delivery in the original packaging and with a tracking number. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. Sales Tax will be collected on the entire invoice amount for items shipping to the following states: Florida, Minnesota, Nevada, New York, North Carolina, Oklahoma and Texas. Find your estimated sales tax rates on the table under shipping & payments. Find more deals in our eBay store! FAQ Who will my item ship with? World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2112.5

487131177400881Sony Playstation 3 Super Slim PS3 250GB250 GB1 ControllerCables The new PlayStation 3 Superslim sports a retro look. The matte black finish on the grooved panel running across the top of the console reminds us of the Atari 2600, while the top loading disc drive brings back memories of playing Sonic CD on the redesigned Sega CD in the early 90s.Weighing just 4.6lb (2.1kg), the Super Slim is three pounds lighter than the PS3 Slim and is approximately 20 percent smaller and thinner than previous models, measuring 11.4" 2.3" 9" (29 6 23 cm). The sleek curved frame, small size and lightweight doesnt make any difference to the performance of the new console (unless youre planning on moving your PS3 around frequently), but if you have limited space in your T.V. cabinet, it does fit quite snugly among your other devices without taking up too much space.The major design change comes courtesy of the Blu-ray drive. The grooved central panel on top of the console, which is encased top and bottom by the familiar dust-collecting glossy black plastic styling of previous models, isn't just part of the new aesthetic. In this latest revision, you have to physically place the disc into the Blu-ray drive and then manually slide the loading tray from right to left to close it, so the ridges give your fingertips something to grasp as you close the panel.Though we like the overall design, the build quality of the loading panel doesnt instil us with confidence as the plastic sliding panel is quite thin and flimsy; we do worry that it will break over long term use, or if we close it too vigorously. Manually having to close the panel feels a little bit awkward and clunky too when compared to the way you simply tease the mouth of other PS3 models with your game disc and watch it smoothly swallow it up. Elsewhere, all the main features on the PS3 are present, including the AC adaptor port, Optical out, RCA, Ethernet and HDMI slots on the rear of the console, as well an air vent that to ensure it doesnt overheat. On the front panel are two USB ports on the bottom left-hand side, and the on/off switch on the right, which lights up either green or red depending on its current status. Theres a small design change on the front panel as the on/off switch now sits on a slightly protruding toggle bar measuring around six inches. Pressing the right hand-side of that bar turns the console on and off and pressing the left-hand side opens up the disc-loading tray, though this can also be done manually.In the box, you get the wireless DualShock 3 controller and charging cable, a composite A/V cable and power cable. Once again, the bundle disappointingly doesnt include a HDMI cable which youll have to buy separately if you want to get the most out of the 1080p/1080i/720p display. The Superslim is said to produce less power than previous models, with a 190W power supply replacing the 250W supply of the most recent Slim models, but internally you still have the same RSX GPU drive and 45nm Cell processor. The Superslim currently comes with a hefty 250GB harddrive, which is a good size for storing lots of data. In terms of performance, there doesnt appear to be any difference between the Superslim and the previous models as loading times are identical. However, it is noticeably quieter than any previous SKU with very quiet whirring sounds even when you first load a discVideo Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles4177.5

World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. Our Guarantee Our Mission Payment & Shipping Return Conditions FAQ Payment & Shipping PayPal is the ONLY form of payment that we accept. Please pay within 24 hours of auction close to ensure fast shipping. If payment is not received within 4 days of auction close, an unpaid item dispute will be filed. If payment is not made within 8 days of auction close the item will no longer be available for purchase. Items normally ship within 24 business hours of receiving cleared payment, but may ship on the same day if the item is paid for by 7AM CST. We ship 5 days a week, Monday through Friday. If you order and pay for an item on Friday, Saturday, Sunday, or during a holiday your item will not ship out until the following Monday or business day. Also, we can NOT change a shipping address once an order is processed under any circumstances, so please make sure you have entered the correct shipping address before completing your purchase. We must ship the item to the PayPal verified address on the order. We also do not offer any sort of local pickup option. Small electronics with a value under $150 and weight under 13 ounces that are eligible, will be shipped for FREE, and may be shipped via USPS First Class Mail or UPS Ground (normally takes 2-5 days to arrive depending on your location). Items shipped USPS will leave the facility on the following business day after the label is printed, due to our pickup schedule. All items with a Value over $150 are shipped via UPS Ground (normally takes 2-6 days to arrive) with Signature Required upon delivery. WE DO NOT SHIP INTERNATIONALLY, SO PLEASE DON'T ASK. Our Guarantee Our Mission Payment & Shipping Return Conditions FAQ Return Conditions Terms & Conditions & Return Policy We describe electronic devices to the best of our ability. We diagnose units as well and thoroughly as possible and our diagnoses are typically correct. We do not show ESNs or IMEIs in the listings because they are guaranteed to be clear. Accessories included with items may not be OEM. Also, due to the nature of used electronic devices, we cannot guarantee battery life. Return Policy Please read carefully: We have a 30 day warranty on all USED items, that the item is as described in the listing above. Items must be returned in the condition in which they were sold, so this warranty does not cover damage caused by customer misuse or neglect. After 30 days, we are no longer able to accept a return. In the unlikely event there is a problem with your order, PLEASE CONTACT US PRIOR TO LEAVING PERMANENT FEEDBACK, as we are very responsive and quick to fix any problems. 1. Please inspect item and notify us within 30 days if there are any issues. 2. To return a defective item, contact us for an RMA number and prepaid return shipping label. Returns sent back at your own expense cannot be reimbursed. Please include RMA number and eBay name in return package for faster processing. 3. To return non-defective items, a 15% restocking fee will apply. Electronics cannot be returned due to carrier incompatibility or physical condition. Some phones require that you have a data plan; we do not allow returns due to incompatibility with your plan, please check with your carrier before bidding. The item must be returned in the same condition as how it was received including all accessories and packing materials. If any item is missing from the original package a fee will be applied for the cost of the replacement. Contact us for an RMA number, we are not responsible for returns sent without our prior knowledge. 4. Once we receive the return, our diagnosis team will verify the defect and issue a refund within 5 business days. (If stated defective item is found to be fully working, a 15% restocking fee will apply retroactively.) 5. NOTE: We do not ship internationally. Buyer assumes 100% liability for any items that leave the USA. We do not offer any partial refunds for repairs and will require that the device be sent back to us (at buyer's expense) if a problem arises. Please be aware of this when purchasing. Thank you. RETURNS OR EXCHANGES ARE NOT ALLOWED ON BROKEN ITEMS. Broken items are sold 'as-is' for parts or repair. No guarantees are made on anything broken. All broken item purchases are made at the bidders risk completely. Our Guarantee Our Mission Payment & Shipping Return Conditions FAQ FAQ Frequently Asked Questions Please read the following to see if your question might be answered here. If a question is asked that is answered either here or within the listing, we may not respond to your inquiry. Thank you. Q: Has my item been shipped yet? A: We ship items on the next applicable business day after payment. We ship 5 days a week, Monday through Friday. If you order and pay for an item on Friday, Saturday, Sunday, or during a holiday your item will not ship out until the following Monday or business day. Please see the Payment & Shipping tab for more information. Q: Do you ship internationally? A: We do not ship internationally at this time. Q: When will I receive my refund? A: It typically takes 1 to 5 business days for us to check in, process, and test your return, depending on our amount of inbound shipments. If it has been more than 5 days since the tracking shows that we received your return, please contact us. Q: Can you go any lower on this phone? / Will you accept an offer? A: The prices that we have listed are the lowest that we can offer at this time. Q: Does this phone come with a charger? A: The listing description will display all of the accessories that are included or not included with that item. Q: Is this phone unlocked? A: Devices are locked to the wireless carrier listed in the title, unless it explicitly states that they are unlocked. We do not support the process of unlocking and will not be able to accept a return for the inability to unlock a device. Q: I live close by, can I come pick it up? A: We are not offering local pickup as a shipping option and have no plans to do so in the future. Q: Do you include an invoice in the package? A: In an effort to remain green, we do not include paper invoices with our shipments. Q: Is this a picture of the actual phone? Can you email me more pictures? A: Due to the large amount of devices we process on a daily basis, it is logistically impossible to photograph every single device. You will either receive the device from the photograph or one of very similar condition. We try to be as objective as possible when listing our items and describing the condition, so that you may feel comfortable knowing what you are purchasing. Q: Can you send me the ESN? Is the ESN clean? A: We do not give out ESN numbers. We verify and guarantee that all of our ESN's & IMEI numbers are clean and ready to be activated with the listed carrier. We stand by them 100%, and if for any reason the carrier will not activate the item, we will give you a full refund. Q: Why do you charge sales tax in so many states? A: Our parent company has nexus in all 50 states, so we are required to charge sales tax everywhere, not just in our home state of Texas. Helpful Links More Items! The growing blockbuster catalog is backed by a library of free-to-play and indie games, giving you flexibility in how you pay and play.The PS4 also acts as a social hub, with several built-in features that take advantage of the social networks you're already using. The controller's Share button opens up a world of video sharing, with the option to stream your gameplay live or record it to edit and post later.PlayStation Vita owners will enjoy the connectivity that ties the two devices together, from Remote Play, which allows you to play your PS4 games on your Vita's screen over a local Wi-Fi network, to Cross-Buy, which allows you to purchase a game digitally only once and play it on both your PS4 and your Vita. It is impossible for us to test and guarantee each and every battery's length of charge. How soon will you ship it? We ship within 1 business day of payment received. Our orders are pulled at 8am so if your payment is received after that, it will ship on the following day. We are closed on weekends and holidays so payments received after 8am on Fridays, will ship by 3pm on Mondays. 4. Where is the tracking information? This is automatically uploaded into ebay and sent to your ebay messages. Please look there. If you have not received it within the 48 hours, please contact us through ebay messages. 5. What if I change my mind on a purchase? If it is sold with a warranty, you can return it to us for a refund of the purchase price. There is a $10 restocking fee. Original shipping is non-refundable. We do not accept returns on items sold as is. *Refunds: If an item is returned to us, retested and is working, then the return shipping is non-refundable. If it is NOT working, then we will refund your return shipping cost and ONLY with an approved RMA #. 6. What if I have a problem with my order once I receive it and it is not as described? Please contact us FIRST and give us the opportunity to correct it. We strive very hard for 100% customer satisfaction. Though it isnt always possible, we appreciate the chance to get it right. 7. The shipping seems high, can you adjust it? Occasionally, we miss the mark with the shipping charges and we do refund when it has been overpaid. Please take into consideration that our handling fee is included. We pack so that your item arrives safely to you in the original condition that we describe it in. This requires a lot of bubble wrap, foam, and often a double walled box. 8. Do you accept credit card payments? We do take cc payments over the phone. Please call 315.410.0050 x104.We are available Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday from 9am to 3pm for call in payments.****Payment is required within 3 days of the auction ending**** Thank you for choosing Bruin Computer. We look forward to making you satisfied customer!Check out my other items!Be sure to add me to your favorites list!Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles29.99
