Adding or removing an item to an order will change the quote. *AS- IS ITEMS* ALL ITEMS THAT ARE SOLD "AS-IS" DO NOT QUALIFY FOR REFUNDS OR RETURNS. AS-IS ITEMS ARE SOLD WITH KNOWN PROBLEMS INCLUDING (BUT NOT LIMITED TO) ITEMS THAT ARE NON-FUNCTIONAL, PARTIALLY NON-FUNCTIONAL, OR ITEMS THAT HAVE NOT BEEN TESTED. WE DO OUR BEST TO DISCLOSE ANY PROBLEM OR DEFECTS WITH AN ITEM BUT THERE MAY BE MORE ISSUES THAN THOSE STATED IN THE DESCRIPTION. BIDDERS SHOULD NOT ASSUME AN AS-IS ITEM IS IN WORKING CONDITION. WE WILL ALWAYS DISCLOSE IF AN ITEMS IS TESTED, WORKING, FLAWED, OR AS IS. BIDDERS MUST ASK ALL QUESTIONS BEFORE THE AUCTION ENDS AND NOT ASSUME ANYTHING THAT IS NOT STATED. ALL AS-IS ITEMS ARE SOLD ONLY WITH WHAT IS PICTURED AND AS PICTURED. If there is ever any issue with your item, please contact us. We always do our best to take care of our customers. ALL AS IS items are sold AS IS. Please read the description very carefully and make a conscious decision when buying AS IS items. For all other items, if there is any issue at all, please contact us and we will offer a replacement, refund, or whatever is needed to ensure a positive transaction. We strive to sell quality products at quality prices. We never attempt to sell anything that is different than what is described. Please contact us if there is any issue and we will fix the situation. SHIPPING POLICY: We ship items using UPS Ground and UNITED STATES POSTAL SERVICE (USPS). Choice of shipping carrier is under our discretion, unless a preference is requested. If a specific carrier is needed this may change shipping charges as well as handling time. Bidders need to contact us as soon as an auction has ended. Contacting us before the auction ends is ideal. Additional charges may also apply if special packaging is required. If your package is returned to us because of an incorrect address or if you were not able to receive/accept your package, you will be responsible for any additional shipping charges. We ship to all 50 States in the US. There are extra charges for Hawaii, Alaska, and any US territories. Please contact us if further information or a shipping quote is needed. If shipped via UPS Hawaii, Alaska, and US territories We ONLY SHIP TO PAYPAL VERIFIED ADDRESSES. Please ensure that you eBay address is correct before the auction ends. We DO NOT ship to UPS, Fedex, or USPS store addresses for pickup. There is a 20% restocking fee on ALL RETURNS CUSTOMS, DUTIES, AND TAX RESPONSIBILITIES International buyers will be responsible for ALL customs fees, duty charges, and applicable taxes. When purchasing an item, the buyer agrees to paying these costs even though they are not listed on the final invoice. We WILL NOT change declaration value to anything but the sale price. We WILL NOT mark any items that are sold as gifts. We WILL NOT under insure packages to escape customs duties. All customs forms will be an accurate, truthful representation of what is being shipped with NO EXCEPTIONS. *International orders PAY RETURN SHIPPING on ALL RETURNS for ANY REASON!* There is a 20% restocking fee on ALL RETURNS.. SHIPPING DESTINATIONS: We ship to all 50 States in the US. Any large or heavy packages to sent to the continental US will be shipped by FedEx. Small or light packages sent to the continental US will be shipped USPS. Shipping to HAWAII or ALASKA can only be done through USPS If you have a preference of one or the other, contact us to see IF IT IS POSSIBLE and get a NEW RATE. *International orders PAY RETURN SHIPPING on ALL RETURNS for ANY REASON!* There is a 20% restocking fee on ALL RETURNS. WE DO NOT SHIP TO P.O. BOXES! We DO NOT ship to UPS or Fedex or USPS STORE addresses for pickup. Due to the many problems we have had with shipping to P.O. boxes we will no longer ship to them. The only exception being a signed release form, that we will send you. Also, your address MUST be verified through PayPal, no exceptions. LOCAL PICKUP: All customers are welcome to pick up their product in person at our store located in Detroit, MI provided that PRIOR ARRANGEMENTS with our eBay department have been made. All local pick up customers will be required to present a valid form of ID with the identical name that appears on their eBay account as well as SIGN an eBay invoice to verify the item was picked-up and is what was described. All *AS IS* items will also have to be signed for and the signature will be your agreement that the item is what was stated. Any items not picked-up after 30 days WILL be listed again or sold in our store unless prior arrangements have been made. You may make payment in store at the time of pickup if that is desired. PAYMENTS AND PROCESSING: PERSONAL CHECKS ARE NOT ACCEPTED. SALES TAX: We are required by law to collect sales tax on all auction items with a delivery address in Michigan. This applies to items which are picked up locally. The tax rate is 6%. Payment for all items is due within 4 days of the auctions ending date unless we are contacted and agree to a longer period. Payment can be made at our Detroit location if you are going to pick up the item in person. Invoices are ready at the close of auction UNLESS an adjusted invoice is needed. If an adjustment is needed please contact us via message to request the change. Photographs often describe the item better than words. Find more deals in our eBay store! FAQ Who will my item ship with? World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2107.5

World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2132.5

Product Condition in Detail: * Defective - These products are used and sold in defective condition. These products are NOT in working condition and should be purchased with the intention for using them as parts or for repair. Defective items may be missing part and/or pieces. Systems will not include hard drives. Systems may or may not feature cosmetic damage. Game products will include the game disc(s). Games may or may not include a DVD or game case (will be shipped in a disc sleeve as alternative). Accessory products will include the accessory advertised and may or may not include product instruction manual. Game disc(s) may or may not feature slight scuffs and scratches per use. Game cases and accessories may be slightly dirty and/or feature pen marks and stickers (note, see refunds and return policy for Gamers Inc. product bar code information). This action is for a defective copy of the product only and will not include any additional accessories and it may or may not include additional content codes such as on line pass codes or additional down loadable content. As this item is defective, any content codes that may be included are not guaranteed to work (may be expired or previously used by original owner). Note: We cannot pull games by request for specific feature such as instruction manuals or working content codes. Depending on the game, some exceptions may be made, at our discretion. All photos are stock images unless otherwise specified. All games come with original cover art unless otherwise specified. Used games may, or may not, be Greatest Hits/Selects/Platinum Hits version. About Us Shipping Payment Terms Warranty We ship to all fifty states and any country listed in ebay's Global Shipping program. This item will be shipped via USPS Priority or UPS ground for large items. Shipments will only be made to confirmed PayPal addresses. US Shipping Our goal is to ship within three (3) days of PayPal receipt of payment, and we guarantee it will leave our store within three (3) business days. Shipping time with UPS Priority is generally 2-6 business days and we will email the tracking information when shipment is made. Expedited shipping is available for additional costs at the buyer's expense, so please email any special requests, and we will try to get you a quote within 24 hours. We currently ship from multiple locations in the states of Texas, Tennessee, Illinois, Washington, Nevada, and Florida. International Shipping Our goal is to ship your item to ebay's Global Shipping warehouse within three (3) days of PayPal receipt of payment, and we guarantee it will leave our store within three (3) business days. Shipping time with USPS Priority is generally 2-6 business days to their warehouse and we will email the tracking information when shipment is made. We currently ship from multiple locations in the states of Texas, Tennessee, Illinois, Washington, Nevada, and Florida. About Us Shipping Payment Terms Warranty We are only able to accept PayPal payments. It is a safe and secure process and offers the most protection to buyers and sellers alike. PayPal also gives you the flexibility to pay with your checking account, debit or credit cards. Payment is expected within eight (8) days. Sales tax must be collected for all Texas, Tennessee, Illinois, Washington, Nevada, and Florida buyers. We are unable to accept orders from resellers. About Us Shipping Payment Terms Warranty We will do our best to accurately describe the item in the listing. Please feel free to email any additional questions. Payment is expected within eight (8) days of auction end. Be sure to monitor email (and "Junk E-Mail") upon completion of auction for Cash America results notification. Product Condition in Detail: * Defective - These products are used and sold in defective condition. These products are NOT in working condition and should be purchased with the intention for using them as parts or for repair. Defective items may be missing part and/or pieces. Systems will not include hard drives. Systems may or may not feature cosmetic damage. Game products will include the game disc(s). Games may or may not include a DVD or game case (will be shipped in a disc sleeve as alternative). Accessory products will include the accessory advertised and may or may not include product instruction manual. Game disc(s) may or may not feature slight scuffs and scratches per use. Game cases and accessories may be slightly dirty and/or feature pen marks and stickers (note, see refunds and return policy for Gamers Inc. product bar code information). This action is for a defective copy of the product only and will not include any additional accessories and it may or may not include additional content codes such as on line pass codes or additional down loadable content. As this item is defective, any content codes that may be included are not guaranteed to work (may be expired or previously used by original owner). Note: We cannot pull games by request for specific feature such as instruction manuals or working content codes. Depending on the game, some exceptions may be made, at our discretion. All photos are stock images unless otherwise specified. All games come with original cover art unless otherwise specified. Used games may, or may not, be Greatest Hits/Selects/Platinum Hits version. Find more deals in our eBay store! FAQ Who will my item ship with? World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system. This applies to items which are picked up locally at one of our facilities. The tax rate will be 6%. Payment for all items is due within 5 days of the auctions ending date. An e-mail notice is sent from our Paypal account after the end of auction with a checkout link. Non paying bidders will be left negative feedback unless they contact me via email to advise of a delay. Shipping Information: Please Note- ALL shipping costs are non-negotiable. We will only ship to the PayPal-REGISTERED Address included with the PayPal payment. We ship 3 days a week which will sometimes vary. We try to get items out no later than 2-3 days after the auction ends. We DO NOT ship on weekends. Items with payment received on Friday through Sunday will not ship until the following Monday. If you choose Media Mail as your shipping option- please allow up to 14 days for delivery SHIPPING AND INSURANCE Please use the Shipping Calculator located at the bottom of this listing. Shipping quote is based on the actual published rates currently charged by the USPS and UPS. Insurance and delivery confirmation for ALL packages are included in the S&H fees. If your package is returned to us because of an incorrect address or if you were not able to receive/accept your package you will be responsible for shipping, return shipping & re-shipping charges. SHIPPING DESTINATIONS At this time, we ship only to the USA from from our Baltimore, Maryland location. No shipments will be made outside of the USA nor to Puerto Rico. No shipments will be made outside of the USA. COMBINE SHIPPING We do offer combined shipping on multiple purchases in order to save our customers a great deal of money. The process of combining shipments can be difficult because of the extreme variation of the products that we sell (which range vastly in size, weight and fragility). We have developed a general system that usually works to everyone's satisfaction. After you win multiple auctions you will be allowed to combine your items automatically through our checkout system which will be e-mailed to you within 24 hours of winning any auction. For more detailed information on how our shipping and combined shipping work please click our calculate shipping icon located on every auction. PLEASE NOTIFY ME PRIOR TO PAYING FOR YOUR ITEMS, IF YOU WISH TO COMBINE SHIPPING. LOCAL PICK UP All customers are welcome to pick up their product in person at our store located in Dundalk , Maryland provided that prior arrangements with our eBay department have been made, which may include scheduling an appointment for your pickup. You will not be charged for shipping, however, there is a $2.00 handling fee for all purchases under $25.00. All local pick up customers will also be required to present a valid form of ID (drivers license or credit card) with the identical name that appears on their eBay account. This is so that no one else attempts to pickup your item if it has been paid via Paypal. Please remember that any purchased product that is not picked up after 30 days will remain the property of Fast Cash Pawnbrokers and you will be credited for your full purchase minus a $5 or 20% restocking fee (whichever is higher). Please remember, do not show up for your local pick up with out making prior arrangements through the eBay department, as the facility will not be prepared to handle your order. Unscheduled pickups will be turned away! Returns/Refunds: REFUND POLICY GENERAL Please remember that FastCashPawnbroker.com sells items in various condition, from brand new and factory sealed to severely damaged and parts only. Please make sure you always read the condition of each item prior to bidding. All refund claims must be made within 14 days from receipt of product and all requests must be in writing (email). With the exception of a missing item all refunds will require a return authorization number (RMA) issued by fastcastpawnbroker.com and the item must be shipped back to us for inspection and processing. Failure to obtain an RMA prior to returning an item will result in an Unauthorized Return which will incur additional penalties (see bellow for details). All returned items must be sent through the mail (UPS or Postal Service) and may NOT be dropped of in person. Any reimbursements will be made via the payment method chosen by the customer when the item was purchased (ie: if you paid with your Visa Card you will be refunded on your Visa Card). Please note that refunds take up to 7 days to post to your account and may not be visible until your next months billing statement. REFUND INCORRECT ITEM In the event that a customer receives an item different than the item that appeared at auction, the customer will be fully refunded for that item including all shipping costs and packing/handling fees related to that item as well as return shipping costs, up to the shipping amount originally charged for the item returned. REFUND SHIPPING DAMAGE In the event that an item is damaged, beyond the condition stated at auction, the customer may claim up to the amount of insurance purchased on the package. REFUND UNAUTHORIZED RETURN In the event that we receive any item that does not contain an RMA number (Return Merchandise Authorization) and to the extent that we can identify the item, we will refund the full purchase price for the item minus a 30% restocking fee. We will NOT refund any shipping, packing or handling fees. Contact: via phone: 1-888-888-5991 About Us: FastCashPawnbroker.com is the eBay Division of Fast Cash Pawnbrokers, a company serving Baltimore, Maryland. We specialize in offering new and used merchandise for sale at bargain prices. Our stock is varied, constantly changing, and includes many limited-quantity items. We select items for auction that we feel will be attractive to the online buying audience. We hope you will enjoy bidding on the merchandise we offer for auction, and we will try to assure your satisfaction. Fast Cash Pawnbrokers is an established, licensed business with a reputation to maintain. We guarantee that the merchandise you receive from us is as represented. What does that mean? Well, we are human and can make mistakes. So if you are not satisfied due to an unrecognized or unreported product flaw or misrepresentation, we will work diligently to rectify your concerns - up to and including allowing the return of the item and providing a full refund. Our industry is closely regulated and monitored. Every single item that passes through our stores is not only examined for function and serviceability, it also has its model and serial numbers reported to the police for a check against law enforcement databases. That should reassure you. After all, how many other auction sellers can guarantee that their merchandise has been screened in this way? Find more deals in our eBay store! FAQ Who will my item ship with? World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2132.5

Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2142.5

If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2155.5

Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. Find more deals in our eBay store! FAQ Who will my item ship with? World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2131.01

World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system. Find more deals in our eBay store! FAQ Who will my item ship with? World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. PS3 / Playstation3 / Playstation 3 / Sony Playstation / Model CECH-250A1 Product DescriptionThe Sony PlayStation 3 offers unified online gaming, access to the PlayStation Network, multimedia capabilities, and a Blu-ray disc player. At 160 GB of storage, the PS3 Slim provides ample memory for a player's favorite games and movies. With its slender design, which makes it significantly light and small, the PlayStation 3 offers a streamlined look and runs quietly, making it a suitable addition to any home. The unit's strong graphics processing by the NVIDIA RSX Reality Synthesizer can output resolutions from 480i/576i SD up to 1080p HD. This display capability makes it an apt choice for high-definition or near high-definition viewing of other media content, television shows and films. The PS3 Slim will even upgrade the quality of lower resolution visual media. This Sony PlayStation 3 features a slot-loading 2x speed Blu-ray disc drive for games, Blu-ray movies, DVDs, CDs and other optical media. The Sony PlayStation 3 also comes with built-in Bluetooth technology that enables wireless connectivity with Bluetooth-driven headsets. This Bluetooth module can interact with up to seven external devices at once, making it a perfect feature for multiplayer scenarios. The unit also comes with a built-in Ethernet port, a USB 2.0 port, and an HDMI port for connecting to other consoles or media players. The built-in Wi-Fi delivers fast Internet access, rapid game downloads, and quality media streaming. Players can also control the console with a television remote control via the HDMI port. The video game console comes with a DualShock 3 controller, a wireless game controller that includes haptic feedback capabilities and a motion sensing function. This controller delivers precise game interaction, upping a person's skills and adding to the overall enjoyment. This PlayStation 3 console also has a unique user interface in the XrossMediaBar, or PS3 XMB. Using the PS3 XMB, players can create main and secondary player profiles; store, display, manage photos in the Photo Gallery, burn and play music tracks, and do much more. For those searching for new games and media, the XMB offers access to the PlayStation Store, an online virtual market where players can try out demos, access game and movie trailers, and purchase and download new games. Access to the PlayStation Network is yet another exciting feature of this PS3 Slim. This unified multiplayer gaming service is free. Individuals can enjoy multiplayer gaming anytime they like with others from around the world. Using their Sony PlayStation 3 to access the PlayStation Network, users can also find online instruction manuals, create online player profiles, and access the system's vast communication features. Virtual gaming also takes another leap forward with the PlayStation's access to PlayStation Home. This feature is a virtual three-dimensional social gaming platform that PS3 owners can access via the XMB. On PlayStation Home, the users can not only access single and multiplayer games, they can create and participate in an entirely virtual world. The Sony PlayStation 3 also offers access to streaming online content through major subscription services. The dimensions of this video game console are a height of 2.56 inches, a width of 11.42 inches and a depth of 11.42 inches, and it weighs 7.05 lbs. The Sony PlayStation 3 is an NTSC-compatible device and will play NTSC media that bears the NTSC-U/C or NTSC-J label. Most video games and movies manufactured and distributed in North America, Japan, Korea, and other parts of Asia are NTSC-compatible. With the Sony PlayStation 3 Slim, players get access to a rich world of interactive entertainment. Simply put, the PS3 is a great machine for delivering virtual play, movie viewing, streaming content, and interactive gaming. Product IdentifiersBrandSonyProduct NameSony PlayStation 3 SlimUPC027242263420, 091037055088Product LineSony PlayStationGeneralTypeConsoleColorCharcoal BlackDevice Input SupportGame padVideo Color OutputColorAudioAudio Output SupportStereoPower & BatteryPower Source TypesPower Supply - internalDimensionsHeight2.56 in.Weight7.05 lbWidth11.42 in.Depth11.42 in.Technical DetailsSupported MediaBD-ROM, CD-ROM, DVD-ROMResolutions1920 x 1080Internet ConnectivityWirelessRam Capacity256 MBRegion CodeNTSCCPUCell Broadband EngineGraphicMemory Capacity256 MBHard DriveHard Drive Capacity160 GBVideo Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2167.5

Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. Buyers will be held responsible for any & all additional shipping charges incurred for returned packages, unclaimed packages, wrong addresses, delivery intercept & return transit. Transactions may be cancelled at our discretion. Any offers made by buyer with 0% feedback ratings will be automatically declined, contact us if you have any questions. We employ eBays automated unpaid item assistant. Unpaid item cases will be opened 4 days after the auctions ends, if not paid for. Buyers must contact us about any arrangements prior to the case being opened by the eBay automated service, as we have no control over exceptions once this occurs. Our office hours are Monday through Friday 10 am MST - 6 pm MST. You can contact us either through eBays message service or call at 505-344-7296. No shipping occurs on the weekends. Emails are not answered over the weekends. Every Monday morning we all work expeditiously to address all weekend occurrences. We appreciate the opportunity to serve you. Thank YOU, for helping us to make eBay a great place to sell! We appreciate your time & value your interest. Thanks again. Enjoy your eBay experience. Good luck Bidding!! We accept Paypal, All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Master Card, Discover & American Express) Bank Wire Transfers and Cashiers Checks. If you'd like to do a bank wire, please contact us before purchase for payment arrangements. Cashiers checks are subject to a 7 to 14 business day hold before item is shipped. All shipments valued at $250+ as well any packages measuring longer than 18" in length, will require a signature. Need your package shipped faster? We offer upgraded shipping options. Contact us for a quote. When paying with Paypal, your shipping address must be Paypal Verified. Unfortunately, at this time, we do not offer international shipping options. We ask that if you are unhappy with your purchase for any reason, please contact us first and allow us to correct the problem. We stand behind every product we sell and assure a pleasant buying experience for you. We guarantee your item will arrive in its as described condition or we will offer your a full refund on your purchase price. Find more deals in our eBay store! FAQ Who will my item ship with? World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. If you have questions or need help with a combined invoice please contact us prior to payment through eBay's messaging system.Video Games & Consoles:Video Game Consoles2125.0

If you are paying with a credit card (not through PayPal), you will need to call us with your credit card number so that your payment can be processed manually. We do not accept Paypal payments from Paypal accounts located outside of the United States. ALL orders must be finalized within 10 days after the end of the 1st auction. Once you have received your grand total, the order can not be changed. If timely payment does not occur within 10 days from the ending date of the auction(s), we reserve the right to file an Unpaid Item Claim with eBay to regain all fees and commissions associated with the item(s). Once filed, a claim will NOT be retracted unless it was filed mistakenly. If a bidder no longer wants an item and doesn't want a claim filed on them, an arrangement can be made to personally reimburse us for any listing fees associated with the item(s). Ohio residents must pay 7.00% sales tax on all purchases.Shipping Terms: Shipping for most Coin and Currency Fixed Price (Buy It Now) listings is FREE. Shipping for most Coin and Currency Auctions is $5.00 for your first item and $1.00 per additional item (up to $10 maximum for your entire order). Items that are not coins or currency are not under the $5.00 policy and will be charged the actual shipping cost, unless otherwise specified. Please check We offer combined shipping for all won items that have not yet been paid for. We allow up to 10 days for combining completed Auctions and Buy It Now items. When you've won the first item, keep bidding but DO NOT PAY UNTIL YOU ARE DONE WINNING ITEMS. Once you are finished winning items, you should go through checkout and pay for them. If shipping does not combine automatically at that point, contact us to request an invoice. We ship via UPS SurePost and USPS. If you require a specific shipping method or expedited shipping, please contact us for a quote. Packages over 70 pounds in weight can only be shipped via UPS. You may choose to pick your item(s) up from our location. Please contact us at least 24 hours in advance to schedule a pickup. Items may only be picked up during our normal business hours. Due to problems with customs, we will no longer ship items Internationally. We are not responsible for any product that is lost or damaged as a result of an act of terrorism, as shipping insurance does not cover it.Feedback & Returns:Customers who are not satisfied with their purchase may return the item in its original condition and original packaging (if applicable) with a return authorization number within 30 days of receiving the product for a full refund of the purchase price. All returns must have a Return Authorization Number. Please contact us about your return for a Return Authorization Number before you send your item(s) back.If you have a problem with an item, please contact us before leaving feedback! Customers who leave NEUTRAL or NEGATIVE feedback for us will be blocked. In addition, customers who leave derogatory comments in positive feedback may be blocked as well.Positive feedback is automatically given to you when your order is shipped. Please allow up to 24 hours for positive feedback to be left for you.Other Conditions:Considering the large number of auctions we are constantly running, we are occasionally out of a product. World's Best Deals ships with both UPS and USPS, shipping carriers are selected at the time of shipping and customers are notified with tracking numbers upon shipment. Does World's Best Deals also ship internationally or to US territories? Yes, we do! We ship to most countries using the eBay Global Shipping Program. Please check our shipping terms to verify we ship to your country before purchasing. Can I ship my item to a friend or family member? Unfortunately due to PayPal restrictions, we are only able to ship to the address listed on the payment. We cannot ship to any alternate addresses received via email or over the phone. Where do I send my item back for an exchange or return? Simply visit our customer service website, there is a direct link on our about me page, and complete a request for a return or exchange or simply send an email or contact us through the eBay messaging system. We will respond to your request with return or exchange instructions within 2 business days. Can I cancel my bid? Any unwanted bids can be cancelled by the bidder up to 12 hours prior to the auction ending. Please contact eBay directly for help with cancelling your bid. If your listing has already ended and you are unable to complete the transaction, please contact us as soon as possible and we will try to accommodate. I'm bidding on more items, how long do I have to pay for my original item? We offer buyers a 7 day payment window to have your items paid. Any additional items bid on during that time frame can be combined with your original item and purchased together. We are unable to accept any payments or combine any new items after 7 days however. I would like to combine shipping, how do I receive an updated invoice? Buyers are able to select the items they would like to pay for during eBay's checkout. Combined rates are automatically calculated when items are purchased together. Items paid separately do not qualify for any combined shipping rates and orders cannot be combined after payment has been made. (has minor scratches) included are power cord and HDMI cord, (1) Controller.Sony PlayStation 4: The PS4 is a graphical powerhouse, able to deliver massive game worlds with impressive clarity and detail. 8GB of RAM allows for serious multitasking potential, complementing the great apps and features that make up the PS4 experience.The PlayStation brand of consoles has an impressive history of delivering world-class exclusive games, and the trend is sure to continue with the PS4. The growing blockbuster catalog is backed by a library of free-to-play and indie games, giving you flexibility in how you pay and play.The PS4 also acts as a social hub, with several built-in features that take advantage of the social networks you're already using. The controller's Share button opens up a world of video sharing, with the option to stream your gameplay live or record it to edit and post later.PlayStation Vita owners will enjoy the connectivity that ties the two devices together, from Remote Play, which allows you to play your PS4 games on your Vita's screen over a local Wi-Fi network, to Cross-Buy, which allows you to purchase a game digitally only once and play it on both your PS4 and your Vita.All PS4 consoles will need a firmware update and must be connected to the Internet to complete the update. While your console will not always need to be connected to the Internet, a one-time connection is required for the update.Online multiplayer requires a paid PlayStation Plus membership. Some features require a broadband Internet connection; ISP fees apply.PS3 games, controllers and some accessories are not compatible with the PS4.
